1.content:
Everyone likes to be the hero.

So create a character.

The fifth one will used to create more players when all four slots have been filled up.

As for why I did this story, I like the alternate interpretations of characters in shows/Anime/Comics/ETC. Sometimes, they get re-used in the video games, like Luigi was afraid of ghosts in the 1980's Cartoon and is now afraid of ghosts in the games.

In case one is unsure of what Video Games have shows based on them, here's a wiki page

1.title: Pick a player!

choices: You travel down the pipe
Toadstool travels down the pipe
You and Toadstool call out to each other
something else.
Something else
11.content:
You are Y/N, a 17 year old boy. You are bored, seeking any kind of excitement and hoping you could find a girlfriend. You also are kinda broke, so you had to watch old cartoons you got from the bargain bin.

Out of the ones you watched, you liked the Mario cartoon the best. In fact, you were surprised that even though Nintendo liked to pretend the cartoon didn't exist, they did borrow a lot from it. Like Bowser and Peach being able to use powerups, Luigi being a scaredy cat, and so on.

On a rainy day, you sighed, wondering if you were gonna go on and do nothing forever.... Then you looked out of a window and saw something that boggled your mind.

A green pipe, right in your backyard.

After putting on rainboots, a raincoat, and an umbrella, you walked out to go check it out.

You walked up to the pipe and looked down it.
===

In the mushroom Kingdom, Princess Toadstool was talking a walk around her kingdom, merely enjoying the bright sunny day.

"Sure is a wonderful day... The Sun is shining, the birds are chirping..." Toadstool said with a smile. Then she frown a little bit and muttered, "and yet I'm lonely. Mario loves food way too much, Luigi's easily scared, Toad values his retainership way too much... I wish I could get... "

She then noticed a brand new warp pipe.

"Huh... Wonder where that goes? Maybe I should ask the Mario brothers or Toad if they..." Toadstool began before shaking her head. "No! It's my time to shine! It's my adventure!"

So she walked to the pipe and looked down it.
11.title: Y/N , seeking adventure

choices: "Are you single?"
"Can you wait a minute? I'll come to the real world, but need to tell Toad.
she said something else
113.content:
After a few moments of looking down the pipe, you loudly called out, "Hello! Anyone there"

===

Toadstool gasped. Usually the pipes' magic prevented any sounds from coming at the other end. Not wanting to be rude, she replied, "Yes. I am Princess Toadstool of the Mushroom Kingdom. To whom am I speaking to?"

===

You blinked. Whoever put this green pipe was obviously playing a prank. Who'd claim to be a character from an old cartoon show? Probably the same person who placed the green pipe. You gave them props for being able to mimic the princess's voice and decided to try and pick up the pipe.

It wouldn't budge.

So you decided to play along and said, "My name is Y/N. I live in Canastota, New York."

"New York? That's where Mario and Luigi lived! I have to tell them we found a pipe that'll allow them to go home in the real world!" Toadstool replied in a happy tone.

"Uh, that might be a problem..." You replied.

"Oh, why is that?" Toadstool asked.

"Mario and Luigi and Princess Toadstool are all video game characters... and I guess cartoon characters. Toadstool's been renamed to Peach, even," You answered a bit smugly as you leaned on the pipe.

"...Oh. So this is a warp pipe that leads to an alternate dimension. I guess the Mario Bros aren't going home. So, you know my first name... Are the video games and cartoon good?" Toadstool asked, the wind blown out of her sails.

"The video game series is still going strong thirty-some years after it was created. The Cartoon ran short, but it still has its fans, even if a good amount of them like to mock it to this day," You answered. You thought, 'Man, they're dedicated to keeping this prank going on.'

"Huh... I guess that's better than nothing..." Toadstool replied. "I have a question..."

"Go ahead and ask," You replied. 'If they're a cute girl, I'll ask them on a date. This wasn't that bad of a prank.'

After a moment or two, Toadstool asked...
113.title: You and Toadstool call out to each other

choices: You help pull her out of the pipe
She slips and pulls you to Mushroom Kingdom
something else
1132.content:
Toadstool's voice asked, "Can you wait a minute? I'll come to the real world, but need to tell Toad where I'll be."

"...Okay," you replied with a smirk. "I'll be right nearby."

"Thanks!" Toadstool's voice cheerfully replied.

You sighed before muttering, "Let's see how this prank plays out..."

===

Toadstool then rushed back to the Mushroom Kingdom castle, hoping to find Toad.

"Toad? Toad? Where are you?" Toadstool cried out as she looked around.

"Hey, princess! What's wrong?" Toad asked, carrying a box of city incident reports.

"I found a new warp pipe! One that leads to a different real world, one that's not where the Mario Brothers are from! I was able to talk to someone through the warp pipe!" Toadstool answered.

"Gee! That's pretty interesting, princess! I'll let the Mario Brothers know, so we can go see that world!" Toad replied.

"No. I'm going to see it for myself. It's my time to shine as an adventurer," Toadstool said as she shook her head.

"Ain't it dangerous to go by yerself? Yer a princess!" Toad said as he put the box on the floor.

"I can take care of myself, Toad. Besides, it's only a small trip," Toadstool replied.

"Well... since youse made up yer mind, at least let me come with yah to the pipe," Toad said.

"Fair enough, but I'll wait at the castle door until you put that box away," Toadstool said.

Toad nodded.

===

You stared at the pipe. You said to yourself, "I wonder if I can turn it into a flower pot? Might be nice to grow some red sunflowers. They look like fireflowers..."

"Hello, Y/N? Are you still there?" Toadstool's voice asked.

"Yup," You replied.

"I let Toad know and he'll be seeing me off. Is there anything you want to warn me about before I travel through the pipe?" Toadstool's voice asked.

"Well, It's raining here, but I do have an umbrella with me," You replied.

"Ah. I have one too! Thanks for the warning!" Toadstool's voice said.

"Rememba, princess! Don't take too long!" Toad's voice said.

"I won't forget," Toadstool's voice replied.

'They're really dedicated to this prank if they made a Toad voice,' you thought.

Within a few seconds, you were shocked to see A red-haired woman pop half-out the pipe, holding a pink umbrella over her head..

She was dressed just like the Princess Toadstool on the show. She did look a little off, like her eyes being a bit bigger than a normal person's and her forearms being a little bulgy. If you had to guess, her bosom was about C-cup or so.

"Hello, Y/N... Wow, you're pretty cute," Toadstool said, blushing a little.

"You're cute too," You replied with a smile.

Toadstool then seemed to be having a bit of trouble, trying to get out of the pipe. Then again, it was raining, so maybe it was because it was wet?

She asked, "Could you give me a little help?"

"Sure," you said, extending a hand.
1132.title: Toadstool visits

choices: Well okay
I'd rather go on a tour of your kingdom instead.
A few Goombas and Koopa Troopas appear
11321.content:
You think hard of what to do and suddenly it hits you.

"Okay hold on Princess Toadstool," You informed her.

"And what are you going to do?" She asked still trying to pull herself free as she tossed the umbrella aside to use both hands but failing.

"I'm going and try and pull you free now hold onto my hands tightly." You instructed as you grab hold of both of her forearms.

"Okay,wait owww! You're pulling a bit too hard! Ohhhh,this isn't working!" The Mushroom Princess moaned as you kept on pulling until you heard a faint popping sound then.....she landed right beside you.

"Ohh,thank you so much for saving me Y/N!!" She gushed as she grabbed hold of you hugging you tightly.

"N-no problem." You muttered back blushing like crazy and admiring her stunning beauty despite almost the horrid animation of the surroundings(this was the 1980s after all) in fact she seemed to be the only attractive thing in this whole world.

"So you said you're from the Brooklyn Kingdom?" She asked.

"Yeah, so this is the famous Mushroom Kingdom looks a lot different than what I seen in the games." You said looking around and pretending to be interested but more fascinated by the cute teenaged ruler before you looking bewildered.

"Are you okay?" She asked looking worried. "What's wrong?"

"Er nothing princess,say can you give me a tour of your kingdom?" You suggest.


"Well I did have a meeting of the Head Mushrooms to go to later on today but I suppose I can postpone it until tomorrow,okay I can take you to.....GASP! Wait....." She paused briefly.

"Something wrong?" You asked.

"Say can you take me on a tour of your Brooklyn Kingdom Y/N? I always wanted to go there." She blurted out suddenly.

"Yo..you want to go to New York City? Why? Don't you have you....know a important meeting or something?"

"Well no not really,ever since King Koopa was banished from the Mushroom Kingdom things have been rather peaceful here so I was hoping the Mario Bros would offer to take me and Toad on a tour of Brooklyn but they keep refusing." She said frowning a bit. "So will you take me on a tour of your world please?" She pleasantly asked.

You were taken back you were hoping to take a journey through this magical kingdom but this was quite a switch wasn't it? Nonetheless she was demanding a answer from you so what is your response?
11321.title: You help pull her out of the pipe

choices: The warp pipe sinks back into the ground, trapping you
Toadstool runs off, too embarrassed to talk. you and Toad chase after her.
News breaks out. King Koopa escaped the Banishment zone!
something else.
11322.content:
'If she's pranking me, it's an elaborate one... one that involved digging a hole in the backyard,' You thought as you watched the red-haired person was trying to climb out of the pipe.

"Ah! Woah! Never thought a warp pipe would be so slippery..." Toadstool uttered, trying her best to climbout of the pipe.

"I think it might be a brand new warp pipe. That might be why it's so slippery," You suggested. You extended a hand and asked, "Perhaps I can be of some help?"

"I've never had the chance to try out a brand new warp pipe, so you might have a point. And thank you," Toadstool said as she extended her umbrella-holding hand. Her free hand was holding onto the warp pipe.

Just as you put down your umbrella and grabbed her hand with both of yours, Toadstool's non-umbrella-holding hand slipped.

"Woah!" The princess called out.

"Wah!" You cried as you were pulled into the pipe.

===

Toad was sitting nearby the warp pipe in the Mushroom Kingdom, reading a comic book.

When Toadstool and you were shot out of the pipe screaming, Toad dropped his comic and said, "What the hay?"

You landed first with your back on the ground

As you sat up, you uttered, "Well, that was new..."

When you saw the colorful surroundings, your jaw dropped. The bushes that looked like the clouds, only were different colors. the hills and sun had eyes.

"What the..." You uttered before you heard a whistling sound.

"Move out of the way! I accidentally let go of the umbrella!" Toadstool cried out as the whistling sound grew louder.

You looked up and blushed a little, as you were looking up Toadstool's skirt. Under her skirt, she wore bloomers, the kind girls wore in old cartoons.

Then she landed on you, with her rear covered your face.

'She's.... pretty soft.. Butt was pretty big,' you thought.

"Ah... I landed my behind on a rock," Toadstool muttered as she sat up.

"Erum... Princess? That wasn't a rock," Toad sheepishly said. "That's a human yer sitting on."

Toadstool's face turned as red as her hair. After a moment, she leaptaway from you, quickly saying, "I'msorryI'mreallysorryIdidn'tmeantositonyourfaceI'mnotaperv ertpleasedon'thateme!"

As you slowly sat up, you said,"I'm not sure what you said, but it's alright. I'm just happy to be in the Mushroom Kingdom, especially after I thought it was... well, a fantasy."

Still blushing like mad, Toadstool took a deep breath and helped you stand up.

"Well, now what?" Toad asked.
11322.title: You get accidentally kidnapped

choices: Run away in fright,these are weird creatures after all
Make a stand and fight off those meanies and save the princess!
113222.content:
"I'm very sorry sir that I fell on top of yo......" The red haired teenaged ruler said turning around to look at the person she accidentally plopped on top of you only to gasp loudly "GASP........" Then her jaw dropped completely and she began slowly backing up.

"Eh princess is there something wrong?" Toad asked bewildered "He's only a human after all,not a Koopa Troopa-Princess,Princess Wait! Where are you going?" As to both of your shock Princess Toadstool turned tail and ran for it.

"Hey-wait! Was it something I said?" You said to a equally shocked Toad who dropped his 'Captain N' comic book and shrugged.

"I have no idea dude,She's never acted like this before! One look at you and she just darts off like you're King Koopa in disguise....eh you're not are you?" He asked from the corner of his mouth.

"No,do I look like I'm a reptile to you? I'm 100% human!" You arched a eyebrow as you replied.

"Okay just checking,anyway we should go after her in case she gets in any major trouble! Come on dude! Let's get cracking!" As he beckoned you to follow him.

As for the teenaged beauty she was far too embarrassed to talk or be around the young man once she caught sight of him,what was wrong with her? Feeling all giddy inside and getting cold feet? She had never acted like this before even the Mario Bros didn't interest her that much,despite all the times they helped save her kingdom.

"Princess Toadstool where are you?" Toad called out as he and you were wandering through the countryside of the Mushroom Kingdom as you walked,you caught glimpses of several very familiar Mario items and surroundings like ? Blocks,coins floating in the air and clouds with eyes in the sky etc.

"Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!" A very familiar female voice screamed out in the distance.

"What was that?" You asked

"What do you think? The Princess of course she must be in trouble come on we gotta to save her!!" Toad began speeding up but you held back for a reason.

"Hold on why can't you know Mario and Luigi help out?" You asked

"They're back in their home land Brooklyn! So technically we're the only ones who can help her,come on this way!" He beckoned you but still you were deciding whether to stay or go although you wanted to help this cartoon/video game heroine she was very cute and pretty looking despite being in a badly animated drawn cartoon,you on the other hand were kind of scared you had never been in a fight before but the mushroom retainer cried out angrily at you to get a move on.

"Come on dude,shake a leg! The princess needs our help!!"

"Eh right,right!" As you began running after him only to find the princess looking utterly frightened surrounded by both Goombas and Koopa Troopas from the show,not the game.

"Okay Princess Toadstool,you're going right to King Koopa's castle although he's not longer here but we're kidnapping you anyway!" The head Troopa said.

"Help!!" She cried out fearfully.

"Oh No! There's a whole army of them,we'll never fight them off! But we can't just stand here doing nothing!" Toad cried out.

So what are you going to do?
113222.title: Toadstool runs off, too embarrassed to talk. yo...

choices: A Fire Flower
A Starman
A Super Leaf or Feather Cape
1132221.content:
Normally this would be the time when you,a expert at old retro NES,Supernes,Genesis and other fourth generation console games would attempt to save the day and imaginary princess of the mushroom world but today you were surprisingly scared out of your wits and ran for it.

"Hey where are you going human dude?" The Mushroom Retainer asked bewildered as you rushed past him.

"Anywhere but here! This is completely crazy! Giant talking mushrooms,turtles that stand on two feet and a imaginary princess and Mushroom World! This is absolutely nuts! I'm Outta Here!!" You screamed as you simply ran for it as the army of Koopa Troopas stopped dead in their tracks.

"Humph! Hey that human kid just ran away instead of fighting us! I guess they're not all brave and feisty like the Mario Bros! Anyway we got the princess,come on let's go to King Koopa's castle and celebrate!"


Meanwhile the princess' loud frantic cries got louder and louder as she was being carried off towards the King of the Koopa's hidden castle.

"Help,Help!! Anybody,Mario,Luigi,Toad! H-HELP ME!!"

As for you,you were hiding behind a bush looking for that particular warp pipe that would return you back home when Toad came charging right up to you panting.

"Hey what gives guy? I thought you were supposed to be rescuing the princess?" He cried angrily.

"Do I look like the Mario Bros to you? I'm just a regular kid mushroom! This isn't something I'm cut out for!" You said frantically.

"Neither were Mario and Luigi when they first arrived in the Mushroom Kingdom but yet they managed to prove themselves! And so can you dude! Come on it's not so bad. Beating up Goombas and Koopa Troopas is pretty simple,it's King Koopa that's the problem,we've had problems with. But you can do it! Come on shake a leg dude,the princess is counting on both of us to save her!" The Mushroom said impatiently folding his arms crossly.

"Well okay fine..." You sighed giving in. "I-I'll give it a shot. Where do we start?"

"Come on no time to explain,we gotta to head them off before they reach King Koopa's castle...here take this in case we run into anymore of Koopa's baddies." As Toad hands you a.....
1132221.title: Run away in fright,these are weird creatures af...

choices: The Koopas and Goombas are driven off. The princess is saved
You get knocked out and captured as well
The Koopas and Goombas run off, taking the princess with them
something else.
1132222.content:
You looked around for something, anything to use as a weapon.

Spotting a thick branch near your head, you grabbed it and put your full weight on it, breaking it off.

"I don't know what's going on in your head, but I know a bad plan when I see one!" Toad muttered.

"They have numbers, we have crazy awesome! Look around and see if you can find any buried bombs or fireflower in a powerup box. Then climb up and attack from above. I'll try to draw them off or distract them for the princess to free herself," You said.

"Yup, bad plan," Toad grumbled.

"You think of a better one," You shot back with a glare.

After a moment, Toad began to look around as he said, "Fine, you win... this time."

"Goon-gah-la!" You bellowed as you ran at the group of Koopas and Goombas. swinging the branch to hit as many as you could.

"A human? We were told that the Mario bros were nowhere near here today!" A koopa uttered before you punched them in the face.

"Free the princess or face my wrath!" You yelled, using the large branch as a hockey stick to knock Goombas into Koopas, knocking them down.

"Y/N! It's too dangerous!" Toadstool said, blushing a bit when she saw you. She was pressed up against a tree, still surrounded.

"What's life without a little danger?" You asked, swinging once more and knocking down three more.

"Longer," A smirking hammer brother said as three of them prepared to throw some hammers at you.

"Bombs away!" a fireflower-powered Toad said as he threw some bob-ombs at the hammer brothers, saving you. He was standing on a treelimb some feet above the fight.

"Toad?!" Toadstool cried out as she looked up.

"The one and only!" Toad replied before he began to fling fire balls. "Still can't believe we're following Y/N's plan..."

Hearing that, Toadstool looked at you with a curious look.

"Get the mushroom!" A goomba grunted.

"How about y'all get outta here!?" you said as you began kicking and sweeping Goombas, knocking out more Koopas. You thought, 'I wonder why the Mario Bros never did this? ...Maybe King Koopa might've tried it and he does look really strong...'
1132222.title: Never did like bullies

choices: Rushes right at you,hugging you tightly.
Runs at you kissing you repeatedly.
The Koopas and Goombas return in greater numbers.
11322221.content:
"Get him!" The head Koopa Troopa screamed fiercely "We'll capture him and the puny pizza topping and send them all to King Koopa's dungeon!" But unfortunately that wasn't about to happen as WHAM!! Your fist hammered him in the head and he fell back.

"Never touch Princess Toadstool again,you hear me you freakish terrapin?" You threaten the now fallen over Troopa,the other Mario enemies stared at you in shock then looked around at each other for support.

"Eh you guys better listen to him unless you want to end up like your fearless leader!" Toad said as he pulled up a vegetable from the ground and tossed it bowling over Goombas and Koopas unable to move,the others still standing backed up and took off running.

Once they were all gone you helped the Mushroom Retainer untie the princess who was looking at you with the utter most curiosity and somewhat lovey,dovey stare.

"That was smooth Real Worlder dude!!" Toad cried out completely amazed "Even the Marios couldn't have driven away all those Goombas and Koopas like that! You gotta to teach me some of those moves!"

As for the beautiful Princess Toadstool herself she......
11322221.title: The Koopas and Goombas are driven off. The prin...

choices: Princess Daisy shows up.
Switch to a scene where King Koopa escapes
She asks if you wanted a house in the village.
something else.
113222211.content:
You blushed as the pink princess rushed at you and nearly tackled you with a hug that nearly felt bone-crushing.

'Why didn't she fight back if she was this strong?!' You thought.

"Thank you, Y/N!" Toadstool said. She blushed once more as she recalled that she sat on your face. "And... can you forgive me for... sitting on you?"

"Princess, I don't blame you, I blame the wet pipe," You said. "Now, can I take off my raincoat? It's rather warm and I'm starting to sweat."

"Oh... Okay and thanks," Toadstool replied.

As you took off the raincoat, Toad asked, "So... care for a tour around the village?"

"Sure, just let me put my raincoat down down somewhere," you answered.

"Let's use my house," Toadstool replied.

===

After you put away your raincoat at Toadstool's house, she and Toad took you around the town around the castle.

There was several stores of various items, a carpenter or two, a construction company, a library, a sporting goods store... and an adventurer's guild.

That last one was surprising, so when it was pointed out, you asked, "Why was that made?"

"A lot of people like to travel, discover things, explore ruins, and deal with various baddies," Toad answered.

"...So the Mario Bros aren't the only ones who fight the Koopa clan?" You asked, liking the idea that you might be paid to travel to places and fighting off bad guys.

"There's a lot of Koops, but the Mario brothers and us tend to be the ones who can only drive off King Koopa when he appears," Toadstool answered. "Thank goodness that he and a large number of his troops are stuck in the banishment zone behind ten thousand bricks. There's no way he can escape."

"Except if he's too stupid to quit and can smash the bricks one by one," you said, making both Toadstool and Toad freeze in place for a moment.

"N... No, that can't happen. No way," Toad quickly said.

"Yeah," Toadstool replied, her tone having a bit of worry in it. "Let's continue the tour."

Toad looked at a watch that appeared on his arm and said, "Oh, jeez. I gotta split. Those reports won't file themselves."

"So... can we go get something I can use as a weapon? I think I broke that tree branch on a Koopa," You said.

"Sure, but let's get something that won't scare my subjects," Toadstool said as she grabbed your hand.

"Like what?" You asked.

===

"A bat?" You asked as you and Toadstool walked out of the sporting goods store.

"Yes. You did swing that branch around like a club," Toadstool answered. "And besides, it's easily repairable."

"Yeah, I guess you have a good point as you put the bat in a back sheath. "So... Why didn't you fight back against the Koopas and Goombas?"

"While I do know some martial arts, it's not befitting of a princess to enter into fisticuffs. What if one of my citizens not in the adventurer's Guild imitated my actions against the Koopas? They could get into some serious trouble!" Toadstool answered.

"Do you have any magic?" You asked.

"I don't have any innate magic, but give me a wand, some space, and a little bit of time, and I can whip up anything!" Toadstool answered with a grin that oozed pride.

You let out a single chuckle before you asked,"So what now?"
113222211.title: walk around and a... weapon.

choices: Shopping
They have a tea party with princess Zelda and a few other video game women
Daisy kisses you, hoping to get a rise out of Toadstool
Daisy asks if you're willing to be Sarasaland's hero.
something else happened
1132222111.content:
"Well, My friend, Princess Daisy is going to show in around Noon or so. I bet she'll be really happy to see a real worlder," Toadstool answered. She then pointed at you, winked, and said, "In the meantime, let's get get you registered with the adventurer's guild. That way, I can give you special official missions!"

You gave her a thumbs-up.

===

The registering was pretty simple. Some paperwork, a trial through a made-up dungeon, and a little mock-fight against a robot boss. Then again, it was in a video game-ish world.

You showed off your license to the princess, who was pleased. She said, "It might a trainee license for now, but I know you'll just get better and better."

You put away your license and smiled, "So shall we greet your friend, Princess Daisy?"

"The fact you didn't speak of food makes me happier," Toadstool said. "Let's go to the train-station, where she'll be coming in."

Just as the two of you arrived, the train pulled in. Within a few minutes, Princess Daisy ▼
https://www.deviantart.com/sakusakupanic...
headed towards Princess Toadstool. She was nearly a mirror image of the Mushroom Princess, save for the brown hair, brown eyes, and yellow dress.

"Hello, Princess P! Who's the new guy?" Daisy asked.

Gesturing to you, Toadstool said, "He is Y/N, someone from the real world. He and Toad saved me from some Koopas and Goombas. Y/N showed he has a tactical mind during my rescue."

"I'm glad you saved my friend, Y/N. I'm Princess Daisy of Sarasaland," Daisy said with a curtsy.

You gave a slight bow and replied, "You're welcome, Princess Daisy."

"Call me Daisy, as I expect Toadstool let you call her by her name as well," Daisy said back.

"She didn't," You replied.

Giving her fellow princess a smirk, Daisy said, "Then it pleases me to be the first one."

"It's not a contest, Daisy," Toadstool said with a frown. She looked at you with a slightly forced smile and said, "You can call me Toadstool, Y/N."

"Thank you, Toadstool. I will," You replied. "So what now?"
1132222111.title: Princess Daisy shows up.

choices: Toadstool, worried because King Koopa returned and kidnapped the Mario bros!
Toadstool, wondering if you wanted to go on a date
Toad, asking if you knew where the Princess was.
A group of Koopa! They easily captured you!
1132222113.content:
"Well, we could check the warp pipe that brought you here. Let you get a few things from your house," Toad said.

"Sounds like a good idea," Toadstool said as you nodded.

===

When you returned to the spot where the Warp pipe was, you were glad it was still there.

But when you climbed on it, you saw that the entrance was blocked up!

"Hey, what gives?" You asked.

"What's wrong?" Toadstool asked.

"The pipe is bricked up!" You answered.

"Oh no! That's one of the tricks that the Koopas like to do, especially when they know the pipe is important!" Toadstool replied. "And there's no telling when it'll unblock itself."

You took out your smartphone.

"What is that?" Toadstool asked.

"My telephone. Technology has advanced in my world more than the Mario brother's real world," You answered. There were bars on the phone when you were near the warp pipe. You decided to test the distance of when the connection would start to diminish. When you were ten feet away, the bars began to diminish. "Oh, good. I can call home."

"So what else can it do?" Toadstool asked with a smile.

" I can watch TV on my phone. Play games, and music, and check the internet," You said. After you dialed, you reached the answering machine, so you said, "Hey, it's Y/N. I'm kinda trapped in another world, thanks to the green pipe in the backyard. Yeah, I'm sorta in the Super Mario games. I have no idea when I'll be back. I love you, Mom and Dad."

"Well, until you can go home, would you like a house of your own?" Toadstool asked. "There's one near my home."

"Why is that? Wouldn't anyone want to live near you?" You asked.

"Well, the mushroom person who lived there got tired of accidentally receiving my mail about King Koopa taking over places, so they moved," Toadstool answered.

"I guess I can move there for now. so what now?" you asked.

"Furniture," Toadstool answered, raising her pointer finger. "And then Food."

===

As you and Toadstool shopped, you asked, "How come you didn't ask about the internet?"

"Dr. Nerdnick and Bunsen explained it to me, asking me if I wanted to upgrade the mushroom kingdom. I thought about it and only upgraded a few places to test it out," Toadstool answered.

"And the Mario games?" You asked.

"The Mushroom Kingdom is a section of Video Game Land and we've encountered a few games in the Mario Brothers' real world that are oddly similar to worlds in this place. So it's nothing new," Toadstool answered.

"Oh..." you uttered, not sure what to feel.

===

The rest of the day was uneventful. After helping you move your furniture and getting you food for your new fridge, Toadstool asked if you needed anything.

You were rather tired from everything so you said no. You ate a quick dinner and headed to bed

The next day, as you prepared breakfast, you heard a knock at the door.

You answered it and it was...
1132222113.title: You get a house

choices: You win!
Toadstool wins! What does she have you do?
You and Toadstool trip and fall on top of each other
something else.
11322221132.content:
There stood Toadstool.

She looked nervous, but asked, "So, Y/N. If it isn't too much trouble, could we go on a date?"

"Isn't it a bit...early for us to go on a date? We only met the other day?" You asked.

"M-maybe, but I'd still like to give it a shot," Toadstool answered.

You rubbed your chin and said, "How about we call it an outing between friends? Also, if it isn't too much trouble, could you put on some clothes you don't mind getting dirty?"

"Why?" Toadstool asked.

"Well, you did mention you knew some martial arts. Do you know Karate?" You asked.

"Only Tai Chi and that's because my gramma taught me," Toadstool answered. "But like I said, I don't want non-adventurer guild members imitating me."

"Well, I would like a training partner for when I practice Karate and I do believe Karate and Tai chi do have some similarities. Will you be my partner?" You asked.

Toadstool blushed when you said 'partners'. She said, "Yes, just let me put on some sweatpants and a t-shirt!"

You smiled as she ran to her house.

===

Some time later, you and Toadstool were having a little match, some distance away from the eyes of the mushroom Kingdom.

You were having quite a bit of a problem keeping up with her!

"Y'know, Toadstool You're good enough that you could hold off those Koopas," You said as you wiped some sweat off your brow.

"But I don't want to make the mushroom people think I approve of violence," Toadstool said, barely looking like she barely broke a sweat.

"I don't think that will be a problem, Toadstool," You said. "Tell you what. if I win, then you use your moves here against the next group of Koopa."

"And if I win?" Toadstool asked, her competitive side showing.

"Then I do whatever you want, no questions asked," You answered.

"Challenge accepted," Toadstool cooed.
11322221132.title: Toadstool, wondering if you wanted to go on a date

choices: You won the race
Toadstool won the race
You notice a hand in a bush and check it out. It was... a hurt Princess Peach?!?
something else happens
113222211322.content:
Toadstool had won. Maybe it was because she's a video game character, a cartoon character, a mix of the previous two, or whatever it might be, but she won.

She managed to knock you down, best three of five. It was an honest fight... well, for the most part. Sometimes, she dodged in a way that had her boobs brush against your arm or back.

"I think I've won. What do you think, Y/N?" Toadstool asked with a gentle smile.

"I guess you're right. You win,," You replied as Toadstool held out a hand and helped you up. "So what do you want to do?"

Toadstool pondered what to do, putting a finger on her chin.

You honestly thought she looked cute doing so.

She looked at you and asked, "What do you think about go-karts?"

'I guess some things stay the same, regardless of video game or cartoon. I just hope there's no blue shells,' You thought with a smile. You then replied, "They're pretty fun. Haven't raced them in awhile, though. So I'm a bit rusty, but don't go easy on me!"

Toadstool merely chuckled, "Glad to hear it. I know a guy who wants me to test out a few go-karts that they designed for long distance. Will racing on a go-kart for a couple of hours be a problem, Y/N?"

"No, sounds like fun," You replied, knowing how wacky the worlds can get in both the video games and cartoon and how that would make the race more fun..

===

The go-karts were pretty fun to drive. Sometimes, mushroom people joined the track and raced for a while.

As for the track, It was one of the neatest ones you saw.

The basic track was green fields and such, but occasionally, warps would appear and let everyone go to a segment on different worlds, like a desert track segment, one in a haunted house, a castle one, and so on. Yeah, you were driving on a Super Mario kart track that changed itself every so often.

Eventually, something happened.
113222211322.title: Toadstool wins! What does she have you do?

choices: Mushroom Woods, where Gramma Toadstool needed some help
Land of Romance, where love potions and hate potions were being smuggled in
Lonesome Mushroom, where UFOs were being spotted
NImbus Land, where The King and Queen fell ill.
some other place
1132222113222.content:
Though it was a close race, Toadstool won the race.

As you parked the carts, Toadstool said, "Guess I won. I know we didn't make any kind of deal, I was wondering if we could do go on a date somewhere in a few days, where I'm going to do some political stuff."

You chuckled a little bit before you replied, "I'd love to. Besides, I'd get to see more of Video Game Land."

"Thanks!" Toadstool happily said before kissing you on the cheek. She skipped away, practically on cloud nine.

You blushed a little as you felt the spot where she kissed you. You went back to your new home.

The next day, you got a job, helping Toad with some of his jobs around the castle. Mostly delivering paperwork or delivering coffee/juice/water/soda and snacks. Toad was pretty helpful and even had a few stories that were interesting... as well as a few stories that let you know he had some blackmail on some rather jerky people, which made him a bit scary.

Outside of that, you got a license for adventuring and completed a few tasks.

Most of which was finding lost pets or helping deliver groceries.

You kept an eye on the newspapers and the internet cafes for any signs of King Koopa or his Koopalings. It was mostly a fruitless effort, though you thought you spotted a few articles about scams that Cheatsy Koopa might be responsible for.

Finally, Toadstool appeared at your front door. Help from Toadstool was being requested at...
1132222113222.title: Toadstool won the race

choices: "The Big Bad Wolf is doing bad things again."
"A mansion suddenly appeared, but we'll get some help from Dr. E.Gadd."
"There's been some strange sounds and tracks all over the forest."
"She asks if we could help teach forest safety tips to some new scouts."
She said something else
11322221132221.content:
"Alright, My Grandma needs our help at Mushroom Woods. After we help her, we can have our date," Toadstool said.

You nodded before you said, "Alright, I got my adventuring license. This'll be a good big mission to put in my record."

Toadstool smiled before she said, "Great! Just meet me at the bus stop at the supermarket a block away."

===

About an hour later, a bus dropped you and Toadstool off in front of a path leading into some woods. The kind of woods that one mentally sees in tales of Little Red Riding Hood.

Before the bus left, Toadstool took out two fully loaded backpacks from the bus's storage.

Toadstool handed you one of the backpacks. It was quite heavy, making you feel a bit embarrassed at how you had trouble holding one of the backpacks, while Toadstool was able to effortlessly hold both backpacks.

As you put on the backpack, you asked, "So what's in these?"

"A variety of objects, made by Dr. Nerdnick," Toadstool answered as she put on her backpack.

You then asked," So what does Gramma Toadstool need our help with?"

Toadstool began to walk down the path as she answered...
11322221132221.title: Mushroom Woods

choices: you meet with Luigi at Gadd's house. Mario had been kidnapped!
Boos show up and kidnap the princess
Boos show up and kidnap you!
You meet up at Gadd's place, where you learn that the Mario Bros were kidnapped.
something else happened
113222211322212.content:
Toadstool began to walk down the path as she answered, "A mansion suddenly appeared, but we'll get some help from Dr. E.Gadd. He moved near the mansion when it appeared."

"Let me guess, Dr. E. Gadd is an expert inventor and studies ghosts?" You asked.

Toadstool looked at you and answered, "How did you... Oh, thee video game thing, right?"

"Yep," You replied.

After a few moments, Toadstool asked, "We're dealing with ghosts, aren't we?"

You answered, "Yep."

Toadstool sighed before she said, "I've heard of an outbreak of ghosts called Boo Diddly. I've also heard some call the ghosts Big Boos."

You interrupted with, "Don't take it the wrong way, but I think it means that King Koopa will not only re-appear, but with seven or so kids who steal magic wands from the kings of several kingdoms."

Toadstool facepalmed and sighed, "I was hoping that he'd stay sealed in a banishment zone forever."

"Let's handle that when it happens. Let's first deal with ghosts," you cheerfully replied.

Toadstool nodded before she asked," Soo... will we get anything from Dr. E. Gadd?"

"I think maybe a vacuum that can capture ghosts, but this shouldn't happen until a lot later," You answered before sighing. 'I'm gonna hate dealing with King Boo.I bet I'll be taking Luigi's place as his rival.'

"Well, can it still clean?" Toadstool asked.

You resisted the urge to facepalm upon hearing her say something ridiculously stereotypical, but this version of the Mushroom Princess was from the 1980's during a time when the Mario series was just starting out.

"Yes. It can also suck up and shoot back out ice, fire, and water without any problems," You answered as you neared the mansion. It looked just as spooky as in the game. "Now... let's see if we can find Dr. E. Gadd's house before we enter."

Toadstool nodded, a bit scared of how ominous the mansion looked.

Unknown to either of you, in one of the windows on the top floor was a couple of ghosts watching you. Lightning struck, revealing one to be Princess Booette. She looked like a boo version of Princess Peach, but was wearing King Boo's crown.

The other remained in the shadows.
113222211322212.title: A mansion of ghosts in the woods

choices: Trap doors and suction pipes separate the three of you.
The three of you work well together.
Somehow, the three of you step on each other's toes constantly
Princess Booette speaks through a mirror, offering to trade Mario for you
something else happened
1132222113222121.content:
You let Toadstool knock at the door of a small wooden shack, while you looked around for anyone trying to sneak up on the two of you.

"Dr. E. Gadd?" Toadstool asked when the door opened.

Inside was the elderly scientist handing a vacuum backpack to Luigi. The Green plumber exclaimed, "Princess! What brings you here?"

"Gramma Toadstool asked me to find out about a new mansion suddenly appearing in her woods, so I brought a new friend to help me," Toadstool answered.

"Friend? Who is it?" Luigi asked, hoping it wasn't one of Koopa's cronies.

"Hello, I'm Y/N. I'm also from the real world, but one different from yours," You said as Toadstool and you entered Dr. E. Gadd's lab.

"Oh? Multiple real worlds? Sounds like interesting research, but for a later time," Dr. E. Gadd muttered.

"I'm Luigi, one of the famous Mario Brothers!," Luigi said as he shook your hand.

"It's nice to meet you. I take it Mario's been kidnapped?" You asked.

After letting go of your hand, Luigi asked with a touch of wariness, "Yeah, but how did you know?"

Toadstool quickly said, "In his world, all of us are a work of fiction."

"And one of them is like what we're going to deal with. In fact, it's a game called 'Luigi's mansion'." You added.

"So... do I..." Luigi began.

"Mario get's rescued by you. The game only had you by yourself, with Dr. E. Gadd as support," You answered.

"And with all of us working together, I bet we can finish this problem in a third of the time!" Toadstool answered with a bright smile.

"Too bad I only have the one Poltergust," Dr. E. Gadd commented.

"What about using the stuff Toadstool got from Dr. Nerdnick?" You asked.

"Then I might be able to whip something up," Dr. E.Gadd answered as you and Toadstool handed the backpacks to him.

Again, you felt a bit embarrassed, as Dr. E.Gadd easily took the heavy backpacks and took them to a work bench. You promised yourself to start working out more in the future.

"So... While Dr. E. Gadd works his magic, let's figure out a plan," you said.

"We don't have a floorplan. All we know is that it appeared," Toadstool said.

"I have this. Dr. E. Gadd said it's called the Game Boo Horror," Luigi said, producing a modified Game Boy. He pressed a few buttons before it showed a map of the first floor.

"Thank you, Luigi. First thing, We don't split up unless we absolutely have to," You said.

"Sounds like a good idea, but I saw some ghosts when Mario and I checked the mansion... I looked away and he just vanished," Luigi replied, looking a bit sad. He looked at you and asked, "Do you know if..."

"Mario is sealed inside a portrait within the mansion. We get to the roof, we defeat the head ghost there, then we can bring Mario's portrait back here to be freed," You said.

"Finished!" Dr. E.Gadd exclaimed, holding two more Poltergusts. Unlike Luigi's, these looked a bit ramshackled. "I apologize, but due to the lack of proper materials, these have less functions than Luigi's. They don't have the element functions or the ability to be used as a vehicle."

"Better than nothing, Dr. E. Gadd," Toadstool replied as she and you put on your poltergusts.

Looking a bit guilty, Luigi began, "Hey, maybe I should-"

"Keep your poltergust. You're more of an expert at the hero thing more than the princess or me," You quickly said.

"I agree," Toadstool said.

===

Once inside the mansion...
1132222113222121.title: you meet with Luigi at Gadd's house.

choices: Serpci kisses you and you find yourself unable to disobey her
You run into another door, meeting Flurrie, who thinks you're a devoted fan
You run down the hall, right into Hellen Gravely, who wants you as an employee
You trap Serpci in the Poltegust
something else happened
11322221132221211.content:
As the three of you entered the mansion, the door shut behind you.

You looked back and muttered, "Not surprised. I bet it's even locked."

"I'll go check," Luigi replied, heading to the door.

Just as he put his hand on the door knob...

A pipe came out of the ceiling, sucking in Toadstool. The floor opened under you, sending you into the basement.

"Princess! Y/N!" Luigi cried out when he heard Toadstool's and yours cries of terror. He looked around, seeing the pipe retract into the ceiling and the floor closed back up. Realizing he was alone, Luigi quietly pulled out the nozzle of the poltergust, aimed it around, and said, "And now I'm the last one... Luigi, this is your time to shine. You gotta rescue them all!"

===

A pipe appeared in the master bedroom in the second floor and shot out the princess. Before she hit the ground, Princess Booette grabbed Toadstool's poltergust with one hand.

After realizing she was floating in the air, Toadstool looked around and was surprised to see Princess Booette. After a few moments, Toadstool asked, "Could... Could you let me go?"

Princess Booette giggled before she made the Poltergust intangible, letting the Mushroom Princess fall to the ground.

"Owch!" Toadstool uttered before she stood up. Pointing at Princess Booette, she said, "That wasn't nice! Now give that back!"

Princess Booette made a shoo-ing motion with her free hand. Somehow, Toadstool flew backwards, and landed against something soft. As she felt the red pillow cushion, Toadstool uttered, "What the?"

And then a door closed, sealing Toadstool in a large box.

"The box you're inside of?" Princess Booette giggled. "It's a coffin. A very special coffin."

"Coffin? Why is there a coffin in here?" Toadstool asked as she tried to push open the lip open and was unable to.

"Why, to make a vampire, Silly! You spend enough time in that magic coffin, you'll become a tomato-sucking vampire!" Princess Booette answered before descending into a mad fit of giggles.

Remembering the time King Koopa tried the same thing, Toadstool began punching the lid as she cried out, "But I don't want to become a vampire!"

"Too bad, Princess Toadstool! You're joining the legion of the night" Princess Booette said before she dropped the poltergust and flying off, leaving Toadstool trapped in the coffin and crying out for help.


===

You landed on a pile of old matresses. After you stood up, you looked around and noticed that you did not recognise the room. Then again, it was filled with all sorts of mattresses, Looking around, you muttered, "I guess my knowledge of the floor plan is useless."

After finding the door hidden behind a mattress, you saw that there was a long hallway, filled with all kinds of doors. They were all different designs.

So you opened up one fancy looked door.

Inside was a bunch of Egypt artifacts, strewn about like furniture.

"Serpci? But she's not supposed to show up until the Hotel..." You muttered.

"Ah, someone living still knows my name. Are you here to become my servant boy?" A sexy echo-ing voice asked from behind you.

You looked behind your shoulder and saw Sepci, just floating there with a smile.
11322221132221211.title: Ghost mansion : separated

choices: Toadstool gets dosed with a love potion
Toadstool gets dosed with a hate potion
you get dosed with a love potion
you get dosed with a hate potion
something else happened
11322221132222.content:
Toadstool was in her usual pink princess dress, but she wore a full backpack and was holding another.

"The Lend of Romance is having a serious problem. I've gotten reports that love potions and hate potions have been smuggled into there. I'd like your help in dealing with the problem," Toadstool said.

"Sure, I'd be happy to," You said. Toadstool smiled and handed you the second backpack. You were greatly surprised at how heavy it was. As you put on the backpack, you asked, "So what's in these?"

"A variety of objects, made by Dr. Nerdnick," Toadstool answered. "As for the Land of Romance, it's part of the Mushroom Kingdom, but the area is run by various family clans. They still answer to me in the end, though."

"So... ever been there?" You ask, knowing the answer.

"A few times. Once had to deal with King Koopa trying to ruin the marriage of Joilet and Romano. The marriage went well and until recently, so was the rest of the land. But all of a sudden, relationships all over the land break up for a few days, then the two people go back together. Or they get together with other people for a few days, barely acknowledging their previous loves. It was a total mystery why it was all happening until someone found empty bottles of love potions and hate potions," Toadstool explained as she led you to a pipe. "This will take us to the Land of Romance, Y/N. Our job is to find out whose responsible for the potions and put a stop to them."

"So... what happens if someone in love gets dosed with a love potion while they look at the one they're in love with?" You ask.

"They get obsessive..." Toadstool quietly answered. "It's happened a few times, but the relationship seem to survive once the potion's effect ended after a few days."

"And when we solve the problem, do you have any complaints about us having a date there?" you asked with a smirk.

Toadstool didn't answer, but tried to hide her blush as she entered the warp pipe.

You entered the pipe soon after.
11322221132222.title: Land of Romance

choices: she ran away crying and the hate potion wore off
Uh oh. Toadstool's angry enough to beat you up!
You began to make out with her against her will
The hate potion randomly turned on and off,
something else happened
113222211322224.content:
The Land of Romance was kinda like visiting either Renaissance fair or a society of creative anachronisms fair. Sure, they dressed like how people thought people in the medieval times dressed. None of them seemed bothered by your modern clothes.

There was food and drinks, but the prices were far more fair. Perhaps it was because the princess was with you?

So you and Toadstool bought some apples and pamphlets of the towns that had been hit with the potions.

Sitting at a picnic table under a tree, Toadstool was looking at a map and various letters from the towns.

"Koopas may have been spotted in these towns, some with hair, as in actual hair, not one of King Koopa's wigs. I don't know which of the Koopalings. In fact, we might be might be dealing with some new ones," Toadstool muttered.

"Perhaps we might even be dealing with some baddies from another video game land?" You said before taking a bite out of the apple. The hate potion worked quickly. You felt all the love towards the princess get changed into hate. Sure you still felt attracted to her, but you found her really annoying. So you said in an annoyed tone, "I mean, not everything about King Koopa should revolve around you and your friends."

Toadstool looked up at you in some slight shock, "I guess it might be someone from another land, but you don't have to be so rude."

You chuckled, "Me, rude? I think you're the rude one, passing judgement on anyone who doesn't exercise as much as you do. Being rude and judgmental if anyone's first reaction to evil isn't to fight said evil. And what about letting King Koopa run off every time?"

Toadstool looked quite hurt by your words, even tearing up a bit. "I do not mean to come off as judgmental. I just get disapointed and angry when people just give up because things get a little bit harder. As for King Koopa, he's an expert at slipping out of capture like a low-down, no-good sneaky, slimy snake. If you apologize now, I'll forgive you."

There was a part of you that wanted to apologize like she said and tell her that you were under a hate potion. Alas, the hate potion was too strong. "Oh, remember Milli Vanilli?"

"They're my favorite band..." Toadstool replied, sounding worried about what you were going to say.

"A mere two weeks... and I doubt it even was that long... after you saved them from Kootie Pie Koopa, Milli Vanilli was revealed to be a bunch of lipsynchers. Sure, both Rob and Fab claimed to be good singers on their own, but they merely just moved their mouths to four different singers behind the scenes because the four singers were deemed too unmarketable," You said. You hated how much pleasure you were feeling.

Now tears ran down Toadstool's face and she began to sniffle. She uttered, "Y-yo-you lie..."

"Nope. Milli Vannili was just like any other band, prince-ass. They loved money a bit more than they liked music," You replied, making sure she knew you mocked her royal title.
113222211322224.title: you get dosed with a hate potion

choices: No UFOs that night.
A UFO abducts the three of you. It's the Shroobs!
A UFO abducts the three of you. It's Rosalina.
A UFO abducts the three of you. It's Maple the Witch?
something else happened
11322221132223.content:
"I have a request to go check out a town called Lonesome Mushroom. The Mario Brothers, Toad, and I were on the run from King Koopa and wound up in a gold coin mine. We dug up and found ourselves in Lonesome Mushroom. Long story short, some things happened, we drove off King Koopa, and the town prospered," Toadstool explained. "Now I've got a request to go check out some claims about UFOs being spotted in the area. I'd like your help."

"Sure thing, Princess," You answered. "I'll just grab my adventuring gear and I'll meet you at the bus stop."

"Thanks. I'd go and ask the Mario brothers ot help us, but I'm note sure where they are. Last I heard, they were in Pasta Land. So our backup will be Toad," Toadstool said before kissing you on the cheek. "Consider that the down payment for this job."

As she skipped away, you blushed.

===

The bus ride was a bit long and did get hot when it reached the desert. After you got off the bus, Toad said, "According to the reports, The UFOs show up mostly at night. All witnesses pass out soon after seeing them and wake up a bit drained in the morning."

"Can you get us a couple of rooms, Toad?" Toadstool asked.

"Sure thing, Princess!" Toad replied before walking off.

Toadstool looked at you and whispered, "Does it sound familiar to anything in the games or movies?"

You thought about it before you whispered, "Two. One of which had only one UFO and they were friendly. The other was an armada of UFOs and they were evil."

Toadstool whispered, 'And which one do you think it might be?"

"The second. I'll talk about later when we get a room," You whispered.

Toadstool nodded.

===

As you headed to an Inn, Toad ran up to the two of you and said,"Good news and bad news, Princess! The good news, the Mario Brothers are in town."

"And the bad?" Toadstool asked.

"They tried to find out about the UFOs, but... The brothers got caught by them and were beaten up. They're in a room at the Inn and the town doctor told them to rest for the day and even tomorrow," Toad answered.

'Sounds like the Shroobs,' You thought. 'Sucking Vim from Toads and beating up everything else.'

"Oh no! We need to go see them at once!" Toadstool cried out. She grabbed your hand and said, "Come on, Y/N!"

"Right!" You replied as you followed the princess and retainer.

As expected, The Mario brothers had bandages on.

"What hit you? A space truck?" Toad asked.

"Maybe. our memory is spotty about last night," Luigi answered. "Whose the new guy?"

"I am Y/N. I'm from the real world, but not the one you're from, there's works of fiction about you guys," You answered. "But Koopas bricked up the pipe soon after I came here."

"Great. We find a way to the real world, but it's a different real world and then it gets blocked up," Mario grumbled. When his stomach growled, he said, "I want some Pasta."

"Not only is the town's all out from the festival for us the other day, you ate all of the Pasta," Luigi said. "And it was enough to feed the whole town!"

"But I'm still hungry!" Mario whined.

Toadstool chuckled, "Oh, Mario. Now I know you're both okay. Y/N, Toad, and I will be looking for the UFOs this night. Tomorrow, we'll go together to look for them."

===

While in Toadstool's room, you told her, "There's two possibilities that it could be.. If we're lucky, it's Rosalina. Her duty is to watch over and protect the cosmos. She also watches over the Lumas, who look like teddy bear star things. She's on the side of good, so talking things out is what we'll do with her."

Toadstoll asked, "And the other possibility?"

"Evil alien purple mushrooms called Shroobs. They'll be invading to steal the mushroom people's lifeforce. They call it Vim. They're ruled by two evil Princesses, Princess Shroob and Elder Princess Shroob. Both are willing to throw away their entire forces to defeat any one target," You answered. "Not only that, but they also like mind-controlling and altering anything that might be a useful slave. We would have to fight and possibly get as many allies as possible or risk the Shroobs draining everyone dry. We might even have to free King Koopa and offer a pardon."

Toadstool looked horrified before steeling her will and saying, "The Mushroom Kingdom will defeat the Shroobs, should they invade. There will be no need to free King Koopa."

"I should note that in the games, they took over and altered the castle of that version of you. True, it was in the past, so they didn't have to deal with the adult Mario Bros... until some timetravelling was involved. Then the Shroobs dealt with four Mario Bros, Two Adults and two toddlers," You replied.

"Wait, the Mario Brothers lived in the Mushroom Kingdom in the games?" Toadstool asked with a raised eyebrow.

"Different continuity," you said.

===

The night sky was pretty awesome, as it was full of stars.Most were stationary, but a few were shooting stars. Using a telecope revealed that the stars looked like the invincibility Starman. All three of you were hiding under some cover that looked like sand

"Even if we find no UFOs, we still got to enjoy this wonderful night," You said.

Toadstool sent a smile your way and said, "Agreed."

'If only Toad wasn't here, then it could be considered a date,' You thought.
11322221132223.title: Lonesome Mushroom, a desert now with UFOs

choices: "Become mine and I'll free theses 'princesses'."
"And here is the biggest producer of Vim. Slaves, milk him for me."
"Choose which princess will be my hostage and which will be my personal slave."
"Tell me where my sister is or else!"
She said something else
113222211322232.content:
"So... What kind of music do you like?" You asked, hoping it wasn't...

"Milli Vanilli. Their music is just wonderful," Toadstool said, her smiling face was was hard to look at for once. How could you tell her that a mere two weeks after she met the duo, a concert had their sound system repeat a line over and over again, revealing that they were lip-syncers who hadn't sung a note on their albums? True, they could sing, but their manager wouldn't let them. She asked, "So, what kind of music do you like?"

“Are the King and Queen of Nimbus Land sick?” you asked, getting a bad feeling about it.

“Oh, just… Just that she might be faking their illness and has them locked up, just so she can take over their kingdom. Do the King and Queen have a lost son named Mallow?” you asked.

Toadstool looked surprised before answering, “Why yes, they do! And what makes you think Valentina is faking their illness?”

“A feeling and one of those video games I told you about had a plot just like that,” You answered. “But I do hope I’m wrong about their sickness.”

“I do too because Valentina now has a lot of political power and a wrongful accusation would lead to a lot of trouble," Toadstool replied. After a moment, she added, "But so would a royal coup. We have to be careful. If you're right, then we need to stop Valentina at all costs for the sake of Nimbus Land. We just have to hope King Koopa isn't behind it. Was he in that game you mentioned?”

"Uhm, No. in fact, he helped put a stop to Valentina's scheme, as a gang of evil weapons had stolen his castle and he needed help to get his castle back," you answered.

“Yup!” Mario smiled. “You into pasta?”

You nodded before saying, “We’ll have to talk about some stuff later, about the real world. You have the medicine?”

Mallow produced a sealed box and a letter. “Grandpa said that the stuff inside this box will cure any sickness! He also gave me a letter to read when we meet the King and Queen.”

“Make sure to keep all of that safe, Mallow,” Toadstool ordered. Mallow nodded before putting the box and the letter away. The princess gestured to a large bean stalk that stretched to the sky and said, “Now let’s get climbing!”

“Yippie…” you sarcastically muttered as everyone began to climb.

3 - Perverse Mega Mushroom. It looks like the regular Mega Mushroom, but has shifty eyes and blush stickers under its eyes. It makes the user grow, but alters their behavior to be more perverted and naughty.

4 - Metal Double Cherry - Previous users are Mario, Peach, Luigi, and Bowser. which created Metal Mario, Gold Mario, Pink Gold Peach, Silver Luigi, Metal Luigi, and Metal Bowser. The creations tend to be heavier, more arrogant than the originals, and even see their originals as rivals in anything.

11322221133.content:
You were a bit surprised to see Toad standing there.

"Hello, Toad. What brings you here?" You asked.

"The princess is missing, so I came here to see if you knew where she was," Toad asked.

After a few moments, you said, "Is it paranoia if I suspect the Koopa Troopa have something to do with the princess's disappearance?"

"If you had said anyone else? Yes. I kinda suspect the Koopas as well, but they've been pretty quiet, save for the other day. King Koopa's been sealed off in a banishment zone," Toad answered.

"He has seven or eight kids," You answered. Toad's jaw dropping was not a good sign. "So they might be trying to use the princess to free their father."

"We need to save the princess A-SAP! We need to do that yesterday!" Toad cried out, holding his head in worry as he stomped around in fear.

"There's a few places we can check," You said, getting on your knees to look Toad in the eyes. "There's King Koopa's castle, the Banishment Zone he's currently in, or any place where there's been complaints about punk Koopas and whatnot. Can you go check if there's anyone talking about the last one?"

Toad seemed to calm down as you spoke. He said, "Sure can. I'll go check with Toadette."

"You do that. I'll go prepare for any fights by getting some powerups for us," You said as you stood up.

"Gotcha!" Toad said before running off.

So after grabbing a canvas bag, you headed to where there was a bunch of Question mark blocks. Any time you knocked out a powerup, you used the back to grab it. Any coin went right in your pocket.

You might be heroic, but you knew you would need money.

When you returned to your home, you saw that Toad and Toadette were running towards your home. You asked, "So what's the news?"

You thought that Toadette looked pretty cute for a Mushroom Person. Toadette said, "I'm Toadette and I heard from a mail-Lakitu that..."
11322221133.title: Toad, asking if you knew where the Princess was.

a seemingly abandoned town, where you knew you were being watched.

113222211333.content:
You frowned as you muttered, "Eight... Great. That means we'll have to deal with King Koopa's Kids. Their names are Bully, Kooky, Big Mouth, Hip, Hop, Cheatsy, Kootie Pie, and Koopa Jr."

"Those are some stupid names," Toad replied.

"They're accurate to their personalities, save for Hip and Hop. They're twins with the strongest magic wands," You said. "Any news on the Mario Bros returning soon?"

"They're still in Brooklyn, visiting their family. I doubt it'll be anytime soon," Toad answered.

"Well, we'll make do with what we have," You replied. "Let's go, gang."

"Right!" Toad and Toadette said with a salute.

"So what powerups did you get?" Toadette asked.

"A few Super Mushrooms, a handful of Fireflowers, three Super Stars, Two Tanooki suits, and a super leaf," You answered.

"Ohh! Can I try a Super Mushroom?" Toadette asked in a excited tone.

As you took out a Super Mushroom, Toad shook his head and sighed, "Toadette, I doubt it'll effect you. Not many Mushroom people are transformed by-"

He stopped when he heard the sound of someone growing because of a Super Mushroom. Toad asked, "I guess I was wrong about us and the Super Mushrooms. Toadette, you okay?"

Toadette was a head taller than you now and had human-like arms and legs. She had a visible bust, but her lower half had a large rear. Her head and ponytails were bigger, but still had her normal face. ▼
https://www.deviantart.com/joaoppereirau...


You uttered, "Wow..."

"What?" Toadette asked.

"You went from simply cute to quite attractive," You answered.

Toadette blushed and looked away, wiggling her large rear at you unintentionally.

After shaking your head back to reality, you said, "Let's get to the town where the Koopalings are and save the princess. Toad, I'll give you the bag, but let's each secretly hold a powerup on ourselves. Just in case we need it. You decide who gets what."

"Right!" Toad said as he accepted the bag and looked through it. After a few moments, he gave you and Toadette each a powerup.

Right outside the door was a large group of Koopa Troopa.

You were surprised to be in a rather evil looking throne room.

Grey brick walls, stone columns, a red carpet, and a throne that looked like a stone hand. The throne was next to a red glowing pillar and the throne had chains coming out of it and wrapped around the pillar.

You were shocked at who was sitting on the Throne.

Princess Toadstool, who looked at you with an evil sneer.

She wore her pink dress, but the colors were darker and the brooch on her chest was a red diamond. The crown was larger and around her head, rather than on top of her head. The gems on the crown were red diamonds as well.

Knowing a good amount of cartoon plots, you would've bet good money that such a change was all due to the crown.

Either that or it was an evil twin from another universe or doppelganger.

"Thank you, my Koopa Troopa," Toadstool said. She gestured for them to go away and said, "I needn't your help for the moment. I will call if I require your help."

"Thank you, princess," A Koopa Troopa said with a salute.

"She's so much nicer than King Koopa," A second Koopa Troopa said before they left, leaving you alone with the princess.

"So... Are you Princess Toadstool or what?" You asked as you tried to look tough, despite being tied up in a cage.

The sneer grew as she closed her eyes and laughed for a little bit. When she was done, she opened her eyes and said, "I am...

1132222113441.content:
When she was done, she opened her eyes and said, "I am Princess Toadstool. My eyes were opened, thanks to your gift."

"Gift? Uhm... I've barely been here a day. How could I get you a gift?" you asked.

Toadstool paused for a moment as she considered your words. As she rubbed her chin, she asked, "I assume that you either found it in a mystery box or you made a deal with someone."

"Mystery box?" you asked.

"The various floating question mark box one sees around the Mushroom Kingdom, Y/N. So how did you find my new crown?" Toadstool asked, looking a bit annoyed.

"I never found it. Whoever did have it before you... must have claimed it was from me," You answered.

Toadstool let out a huff of anger. "Here I thought you wanted to be my boyfriend..."

"I do. I just never gave you the crown as I never found it," You quickly said.

Toadstool's anger eroded into happiness. She said, "At least you've shown you're both humble and and willing to reach for more."

"Is it enough to free me?" you asked.

Toadstool's response was to raise both her hands in the air. As orbs of purple appeared in the palms of her hands, long white gloves appeared on her arms. Her dark pink dress became purple as she threw the orbs at you.

The orbs flew through the cage and hit you. A metal collar appeared around your neck and shackles around your wrists. As the cage door opened, Toadstool cooed, "There. Now You're free of the cage."

"But not your love,eh?" You replied in a flirty tone. In reality, you were scared.

Toadstool nodded as she walked over to you and hugged you. With a bit of reluctance, you hugged her back.

After you let each other go, Toadstool said, "Now I will show you your new room."

As she led you down a hallway, you asked, "So... what are you going to do with the Mushroom Kingdom?"

Toadstool looked back and answered, "Why, let them know I now rule the Koopa Kingdom. At least the parts that now obey me. Some parts of the Koopa Kingdom are resisting my rule, claiming they are ruled by King Koopa's seven Koopalings... Whoever they might be."

"What are you going to do if they all resist you?" You asked.

Toadstool merely chuckled, making you fearful. She passed by a fancy door and said, "This is my room. Enter it whenever you want, my boyfriend."

She led you to the door next to it and said, "This is your room, Y/N."

Inside was a bed, a dresser, a desk, an empty bookshelf, and a long mirror. There also was two doors. One that might be a closet, while the other led to Toadstool's room.

Looking in the mirror, you briefly saw the Shadow Queen's image over Toadstool.

Noticing your frown, she asked in a concerned tone, "Is there a problem, Y/N?"

You...

1132222113442.content:
The princess said, "I am a magical duplicate, magically created by King Koopa's special wizards, in case he ever was captured. I am to lead the Koopa Kingdom and cause as much chaos for everyone else, while also working to free King Koopa."

"So why me, Toadstool-2?" You asked, referencing the second Belome fight in Super Mario RPG.

"Cute, we're at the nickname stage already. You are in a relationship with the real Princess. So I will make you mine," Toadstool-2 answered.

"Your plan would work better, if you had never told me it," You replied.

You'd be lying if you claimed you didn't love the look of disbelief and shock on Toadstool-2's face.

"Besides, The princess sitting on my face and me going to rescue her does not equal a relationship. You're jumping the gun on so many fronts, it isn't funny," You said.

"I hold the cards here! Not you!" Toadstool-2 loudly declared as she stood up and walked over to you. "You will help me ruin the real Toadstool's life and help free King Koopa!"

"Why?" You asked, barely phased by Toadstool-2's anger.

"Because I said so!" Toadstool-2 growled.

"Since you're as lovely as Toadstool, I'll explain why you're going down the wrong path," You began. "If you free King Koopa, he'll toss you aside and take credit. Maybe he'll even destroy you with something. There's no point in allying with him."

Toadstool-2's anger seemed quickly fade as she took in your words.

"Then there's ruining Toadstool's life. Let's say you do that and then try to step in her shoes. What's preventing the Mushroom Kingdom people from thinking you're Toadstool in slightly different clothes? Your quest to ruin Toadstool's life will ruin your own, as people do judge by appearances," You continued.

"I see..." Toadstool-2 muttered, clearly deep in thought.

"So... I suggest freeing me and we go-" You said before getting interrupted by Toadstool-2 laughing.

"I have heard your words and will not free King Koopa. Instead," Toadstool-2 cackled. "I will rule both the Koopa Kingdom and the Mushroom Kingdom!"

"Oh crap. I should've seen that coming," You muttered. "So what are you going to do with me?"

Toadstool-2 smiled at you as she fluttered her eyes for a few moments. She said, "As for you, You will..."

You are quite amazed and a bit fearfully as the 17 year old cartoon princess of the Mushroom People charges right at you and wraps both long Popeye forearms around your waist then puckers up her big red juicy lips and....

"Y-you saved me...MWAAAAAAAAHHHH! My Hero!" Princess Toadstool beams happily as she finally pulls away and beams innocently at you.

"Eh why did you?" You began turning literally red as Toad behind you rolls his eyes bluntly.

"Isn't it oblivious dude? You saved her life! What were you expecting from her? A fist fill of coins? But nonetheless very cool what you did back there with all those Koopa Troopas!" The Mushroom Retainer with the highly annoying voice looked very impressed but it was Princess Toadstool who was very interested in your physical looks as she refused to let go of you even as you tried pulling away.

"Eh Princess? I kind of c-can't....." As due to her sort of superhuman strength she was slowly squeezing your windpipe and her big Pac-Man blue eyes grew wide as she gasped loudly.

"Ohh I'm so sorry! I-I was so happy to finally meet someone who actually can overthrow King Koopa's evil reign once and for all I-"

"Er Princess not to be a rotten mushroom but aren't you forgetting about Mario and Luigi?" Toad asked folding his arms.

"Yes but as helpful as they are Toad,I'm afraid we need more reliable heroes like YN here. Anyway YN I was wondering....." The princess was thinking hard.....
