12.content:
You are Will. You are 17 years old and live in a room in your parent's basement.

You liked Zelda games. You played a lot of them and liked the adventures in them. You even liked a few mods floating around the internet.

You even enjoyed The PC recreation, Zelda Classic. Heck, you even liked the old cartoon and wished that there could be cartoons based on some of the other Zelda games.

As you played an episode in the background while you were doing some homework, you thought you heard a voice.

"Hn?" You uttered, looking up.

Help.

"Who's there?" You asked as you looked around.

Will you help us?

"Seriously, who is there?" you asked as you stood up.

Please help us

At that moment, you realized that the volume on your TV had gone down. So you looked.

There was a spiral-like distortion on the screen, wrecking the cartoon.

So you walked up and slowly reached for the screen. You muttered, "Please don't let this be a trap or prank."

When you touched the screen, it felt like... jelly. When you tried to pull your hand back, you discovered you couldn't.

In fact, the more you tried to pull your hand away from the TV, the more your arm was sucked in.

"Help! Someone help!" You cried out before you were pulled into the Tv.

===

You fell through a dark void. Eventually, images of various Zelda items and enemies began to appear.

Then it all came to a stop when you landed on something soft.

"Ah... where am I?" You muttered as your vision cleared up. You saw you were on a large mattress in a stone building.

"I apologize, but I used the Triforce of wisdom to call out for help," An all-too-familiar voice said. "I am Princess Zelda of Hyrule. I heard from my friend, princess Toadstool that people from 'the real world' can become great heroes. Could you help us?"

You looked at the voice's owner.

The dark purple shirt with poofy shoulders, the pink riding pants, the light purple vest, the brown thigh-high riding boots, and the blonde hair that held up a tiara.

It was Zelda from the Cartoon! On her shoulder was Spryte. On a pedestal in front of Zelda was the blue Triforce of Wisdom.

"I'm... Will... I heard your cry for help," you began as you sat up. "But what about Link? The guy in green who annoys you as he saves the day with you?"

Zelda's reply was...
12.title: Player 2 - In Zelda's land

choices: You fight Impa with the weapons
You fight Impa with your Karate skills
you go on the quest, with only Spryte for help
You go on the quest. Spryte and Zelda join you
something else happened
123.content:
As she offered a hand to help you stand up, she asked, "Who is Link? I don't know anyone by that name or description."

After you stood up, you had a bad feeling run down your spine. "He's... supposed to be the hero of Hyrule, fighting Ganon, the leader of evil in Hyrule."

Zelda looked even more confused, saying, "I don't know that name either. Is is possible that you are misinformed?"

"Possibly. My knowledge comes from video games in my world. Since one of the games had a lot of similarity with this one, I guessed wrong in trying to use it as a source of info," You answered. "So, how can I help you and the Land of Hyrule?"

"For one, We're under attack by Veran, Twinrova, and their forces. We've been lucky that the two don't like each other," Zelda said. "The guards of Hyrule are skilled enough to ward their forces off, but never enough for us to gain an advantage."

She held your hands, looked in your eyes in a pleading way, and asked, "We need a hero. A hero who can inspire us. A hero who can light away the darkness of Veran, A hero who can put out the fires and ice of Twinrova. A hero who can slip in and strike before villainy knows what is happening. A hero who can bring peace to Hyrule. A hero who I can look up to. A hero who... I can care for."

You felt a number of emotions. Pride at a cute girl asking you for something like this, Fear at the idea of fighting two armies and their powerful sorceresses, a bit of lust at how attractive Zelda was, and a number of others that came and went.

Still, there was a nagging part of you that felt something was way off and wrong.

You licked your lips and took a deep breath before asking, "Do you know what happened to the land of Calatia? I think it's west of Hyrule."

Zelda paused for a moment before answering, "It is a land of forests and ruins. A calamity destroyed all of it centuries of ago."

You took a moment to take in the bad news before saying ,"Calatia is the land where Link was born. I take it Ganon killed himself to forever kill off Link. Since no other hero named Link has come forth, I'll be your hero, Zelda."

Zelda hugged you, tears running down her face, crying out, "Thank you, Will! Thank you! You have no idea what it means to me! Mother will be ever so happy that someone will avenge my father!"

You took a moment before hugging her back. 'So many differences from what I know. I just hope that I can save everyone.I wonder if the Queen's name is also Zelda?'

===

In the armory Zelda gave you a magic boomerang, Crissword ▼
https://zelda.gamepedia.com/Crissword
, and a shield.

"I apologize, but that is all Impa allows me to give out. She did claim that the sword is fit for a hero," Zelda answered.

"It's alright," You said."

"So this is the hero you were claiming you'd bring to Hyrule?" A stern voice asked.

You looked behind and saw that it was Impa from Ocarina of Time, albeit with a sexier figure. She looked you up and down before asking, "You don't look like you're ready for combat. In fact, you look softer than one of the peasants, but you do seem to know some kind of unarmed combat."

"Princess Zelda summoned me with the Triforce of Wisdom. I like to think that they know what they were doing when they summoned me," You replied, staring back at her.

"Then face me in a spar. Use the weapons she gave you or fight me hand-to-hand. Or don't and go on the quest to save Hyrule," Impa replied, unfazed by your attempt to look tough.
123.title: You are the hero of Hyrule

choices: You take the time to learn from Impa, but ask that Zelda learn as well
you refuse, wanting to learn on your own.
later that night, you get kidnapped by the Yiga Clan
Impa gets possessed by Veran and talks Zelda into breeding future heroes
something else happened
1232.content:
You looked at Impa and pondered your chances.

After a few moments, you knew you had little chance of winning, but you knew that you would probably need her respect. So you said, “I know I won’t win, but it’d allow you to tell me what I’m really lacking in. So hand-to-hand?”

Impa smirked for a moment before she said, “Very well. Follow me to the training courtyard.”

So you, Zelda, and Spryte followed after her. You quickly noted that there was a definite sway in Impa’s hips and you did like how big and curvy her butt was. Not wanting Zelda to get mad, you stared at the back of Impa’s head.

Once you were in the courtyard, you looked around, seeing all the soldiers, guards, and trainees. There was both men and women Hylians training, though there seemed to be more women than men. You thought, ‘Did Ganon’s final attack cause there to be less men born over time?’

“So… are you ready?” Impa asked, getting into a fighting pose that appeared to be for looking sexy, rather than fighting.

“Ready,” I said as I got into a position.

The first few minutes of the session were a bit slow, as we were more feeling each other out. I’m pretty sure she was surprised at how skilled I was. Either that or she was surprised at how I was able to take a decent hit from her and she hit hard!

But she had years of experience on her side and was able to win against me, but not before I left her as bruised as she left me.

After I fell to my knees, she wiped her mouth of the slight dribble of spit before she said, “You fight well, Will. Were you trying to become the princess’s guard, that would have been a decent argument for it.”

As she helped me up, Impa added, “But you’ve been selected as her hero. This fight has shown me you need more training. How well can you fight with a weapon?”

“I’ve never fought with one before. The laws in my land are strict about civilians wandering around with weapons,” you answered.

Impa chuckled, “A blank canvas, my favorite. If you want, I can teach you, but you seem like the type to better learn on your own. Whichever you choose, I shall accept it.”
1232.title: You fight Impa with your Karate skills

choices: Moon Dungeon
Snake Dungeon
Demon Dungeon
Dragon Dungeon
some other dungeon
12321.content:
"As much as I want to become your student and train here, I have to refuse. One of my advantages currently is the fact I'm an unknown and thus can slip by a lot that the regular guard can't," you answered.

"Then become my student and travel," Impa replied.

"Temping, but I still would like to learn on my own," You said. You overheard Zelda whispergrumble, "I never got lessons from Impa."

"You still would, but I would appear from time to time to offer a lesson or advice," Impa suggested.

"I guess that would be nice. I accept, but only if Zelda gets similar training," you answer.

"Then it is agreed, You are my secret student, while Zelda is now my main student," Impa replied. "First lesson for the two of you. How to shoot beams from a magic sword."

The lesson was to will magic into the sword and let it fire from the tip. During the lesson, you asked, "Can we use the chargeup energy to perform a spin attack?"

Impa pondered your words and said, "Possibly. See if you can do it."

Somehow, you did it on your first try, though you were a bit dizzy.

Impa smiled, "Good. You have a crown control move, one that strikes both the ground beneath you and the air above you. You may get some more bombs and some rupees when you leave the castle later."

Looking at the sweating-but-pleased Zelda, Impa added, "And if she learns quick and well, then she might join you on your quest."

Zelda smiled.

=o=

After you left to go on your quest, you asked Spryte, "So any dungeons or cursed areas?"

"Diving headfirst into danger? You really do have the makings of a hero," Spryte giggled. "Well, there's the forest dungeon, right near some old trees that look like they could be used as child-sized houses. We call it the Moon dungeon because the layout looks like a crescent moon."

Recalling that the Impa you met was like the Ocarina of time Impa, you thought, 'I bet it is the Kokori, cursed to be monsters or something.'

Spryte continued, "Then there's the Snake dungeon, located right within a lake, where the old Zora used to live. You'll either need good swimming skills or raft. Monsters come from it and make getting good drinking water a hard task."

You thought, 'The Zora under a curse, probably.'

Spryte's third suggestion was, "Then there's the Demon Dungeon, located under a lake. I can use magic to remove the water, but only for a little bit, so you'll need to get inside the dungeon. Don't worry, it's dry inside. Shadowy, but dry."

You thought, 'Dunno who might be there. Maybe Midna and the Twili, under a curse?'

Spryte shivered before she said, "And then there's the Dragon dungeon, located in the old Graveyard, creating minions for both Twinrova and Veran."

You pondered, 'Maybe I can free the Poe Sisters and get them as allies?'
12321.title: learn and quest

choices: Explain about the third piece of the Triforce and Master Sword.
Mid-way through Zelda admits she has a major crush on you.
No time,as Ganon's monsters attack the castle and Zelda trains you in combat.
124.content:
The royal teenage princess thought for a minute before thinking:"Hmmmmm should I tell him the truth about me and Link having
a row? What do I really know about him? Oh well I suppose it couldn't hurt...."

"Ummm Princess Zelda?" The fairy on her shoulder called out in a annoying voice "I believe our strange guest is awaiting a reply!"

"Oh right,right please forgive me! Anyway Link and I had a bit of a row,you know a fight and he actually went back to his home in Calatia(Spryte sighed sadly as she had a major crush on the hero) so now I had the honor of fending off Ganon's hordes of monsters on my own....well with the aid of the Triforce of course." As she pointed to it.

"So did you need any help princess? I'll be glad to assist anyway I can." You suggested at once as despite her somewhat bossy tone you did find her very attractive,especially in those hot purple pants!

"Oh, that's very generous of you Will, but you seem to possess no weapons,are no knight,very sorry to ask this but what exactly can you do to help us?" Zelda asked curiously.

"Well I may lack 'heroic' training' but I'm pretty good at karate." You say without thinking.

"What's that?" Spryte asked looking just as confused as Zelda.

"A sort of fighting style but with your hands instead of a sword or shield." You quickly said "Besides that I do know quite a few things about Hyrule and it's true history and even bits of Ganon himself."

At once both the cartoon princess and fairy's eyes widened in surprise.

"What do you know about Ganon's past?" Zelda asked skeptically raising her tone a bit.

"Quite a bit." You replied "Like did you know his true name is Ganondorf,King of Thieves and that he's been around for hundreds of years? And he's always had the Triforce of Power in his grasp?"

"Why-ho-how......" Zelda's green eyes widened even more as she looked completely flabbergasted as did the fairy on her shoulder. "How is...it.....possible? No..no one.....please Will....you have to tell us more!" The princess demanded inching closer to you.

12432.content:
The fight was very tiring.

You threw yourself into the fight, throwing every dirty shot you could at Ganon's forces, providing enough of a distraction that Zelda and a few archers could fire without worrying if the darknuts would block the arrows.

Yes, you got hit quite a few times, but health potions were splashed on you via Spryte.

You sat in a chair and groaned, "That was something else..."

"You can say that again. I'd have given a Kiss to Link, if he had been around help us ward off Ganon's forces," Zelda uttered as she sat down near you.

As she sat down on a table, Spryte giggled. at Zelda's words about Link.

"So... when do you want some training in Karate?" You asked. "Hopefully, not too soon. I'd like to rest up a bit."

"Ah yes. Those moves you did. They reminded me of a friend named Sing. They do seem quite useful, so I would like to learn them. I think we have some stamina potions, if you don't mind them having a bitter taste," Zelda answered. "And would you like to learn how to use a sword?"

"Which kind of swordplay? The one where it is strictly swinging? Or the kind that involves sword beams?" you asked.

"The regular one. The Sword beams can only be done with special swords, like Link's Crissword. We do have his White Blade sword and his training sword that can also do the sword beams," Zelda answered.

"Huh... So no Master Sword," You muttered.

"Master Sword? What's that?" Zelda asked, while Spryte gasped.

"A sword made by the Goddess Hylia. A sword called 'The blade of Evil's Bane'. A sword that has been used against Ganon time and time again, each time reducing his strength. Once there had been a time where only the Master Sword and Silver Arrows could kill him or even harm him. Now he's been weakened enough where any magic sword can harm him," You answered.

"So if we found the Master Sword, we could end Ganon once and for all!" Zelda cheered.

"But only a hero who has passed three trials can wield the Master Sword. A test of Power, A test of Wisdom, and a test of Couurage," You explained.

Spryte flew in your face and said, "And only Link can pass those tests, mister! Don't even think of trying!"

"You know about the tests? You know about the Master Sword, Spryte?" Zelda asked, looking at her friend.

Spryte refused to answer, so you did. You said, "Spryte has her reasons for not telling anyone, Princess Zelda. Believe me, magical beings like fairies do have laws from the Golden Goddesses and Goddess Hylia that they have to follow."

Zelda looked like she just swallowed a lemon. "Very well, Will."

She stood up and took some potions out from it. She drank one and shuddered. "Drink up. They're bitter, though."

You accepted it. As Zelda warned, it was very bitter, but you felt like you could run for miles.

"Alright, let's..." You began before sniffing yourself. "Probably wash up and get a change of clothes. The battle did get us sweaty."

"...Yeah, good point," Zelda muttered.

===

After getting washed up and a new pair of clothes, you asked Zelda to meet you out to the training field.

"Let's start off with Karate," You said. "The sword Training can come later. After all, we might decide I'm better off with a lance or a warclub."

Zelda smiled.

==

The Karate training went smoothly. Zelda was a quick learner, often only needing a second explanation or you repeating an example.

At first, Zelda's enthusiasm was the only thing making her go through the lesson.

But you didn't insult her because she was a girl, or go 'Exxxcuse me, princess!' whenever she had a complaint or question.

Eventually, she had... incidents where she was 'clumsier' than normal.

She would not admit to anyone (except Impa), that she did it to feel up your body.

There were moments where Zelda thought about dating you, but knew she couldn't because she was a princess and you were a commoner. The only way she could date you was if she made you a hero.

Whenever you corrected Zelda's form, both she and you enjoyed the moments of close contact.

As for you, you enjoyed how Zelda's hot pink riding pants sometimes seemed skintight for a few moments, sometimes revealing her ass cleavage.. Especially when she did highkicks.

"Alright, that's enough for the first lesson. You're a faster learner. In fact, we've probably skipped several lessons because you learned so fast," You said with a smile.

"Oh, thank you, Will!" Zelda replied, tightly hugging you. You blushed, as you felt her bosom press against your chest She asked, "Shall we start on your sword training? I'll have one of my servants bring Link's Wooden Sword."

The three of you carefully walked through the dungeon tunnel, expecting traps to be everywhere.

An idea struck you, so you asked,"Any spells you can cast on us that makes Traps stick out, like they glow or something?"

Zelda looked at you expectantly.

Her blush grew as you put her hands on her.

And then confusion as you pushed her away.

“Princess Zelda, I apologize, but I’m… not ready. You’re a beautiful woman, but we know little of each other personally. I don’t know what kind of food you like, what music you like to listen to, or what drink you like,” you said. "And other than you know that I find you attractive, that I am from another world, and that I know a lot about Hyrule History, what else do you know about me?"

“But… But… But I… You have no idea how hard I talked myself into this... “ Zelda said as she looked down, hiding her eyes from you. Her hands curled into fists as she continued, “I may not know much about you, nor do you about me…. But I do know how I feel about you.”

“Princess Zelda... “ You began, reaching for her.

She slapped your hand away.

“Now that Ganon is pretty much dead, I’ll be getting all sorts of offers and requests for my hand in marriage. I had hoped it would be you that I marry. That you’d fall for my body and we have sex, since you take ‘secret’ glances when you think I wasn’t looking. That you’d take the easy way to become my fiance,” Zelda said, sounding like she was trying her best to remain in control of her emotions. “But you had to one of the guys who are just that gentlemanly. Who knew I would find the one moment where I would hate it?”

She then began to laugh in a rather broken way.

“So now I have to reject offers and hope my father doesn’t accept them when I’m not looking.” Zelda said as she wiped some tears that were falling down her face.

“Huh… now that you mention all that-” You began.

“No. I’m not in the mood,” Zelda said in a rather icy tone. “Leave my room. Now.”

“Zelda, I-” You uttered.

“It’s princess Zelda. Now leave,” Zelda said as she lifted her head up.

Oh boy, was she angry at being rejected, especially with her still crying.

“If I feel like it tomorrow, I may try to find a way for us to get married,” Zelda said with a tiny growl.

As you headed to the door, you said, “For what it’s worth, I had no idea what the full reasons behind your seduction."

So Zelda allowed a guard or two to help you with swordgfighting.

You were a beginner and it showed. You lost many fights, but with each one, you lasted longer.

Zelda's nursemaid, Impa, helped you learn to present yourself in front of royalty. For some reason, that training came really easy, like you did it before.

Impa also helped you with a few other things that could come up in the contest.

Eventually, you managed to meet up with Zelda.

"How goes the training?" Zelda asked.

"Long and hard. I get my butt kicked whenever I swordfight, but I'm getting better," You said.

Zelda smiled and nodded for a moment before catching herself. "That is good to hear. I do hope you have a proper showing. Some princesses from other lands will be showing up. Most will be to find princes of their own."

Somethign about that made you recall something that Zelda said. So you asked, "Princess Zelda, earlier, you said that Princess Toadstool from the Mushroom Kingdom said I was a great warrior, yet I don't recall ever meeting her. Care to explain that?"

Zelda's eyes widened. "I... I... don't recall, Will."

So you bowed, making sure it was low enough that you were looking at the ground. "Please... I know enough that it must have been something that either is blocking my memories or took them away. I ask that you at least let me know about them because my training with Impa is evidence that I did have some kind of adventure in Video Game land! One that might allow me to win your hand in the contest."

Zelda bit her lip for a few moments and said, "I might... be able to... use the Triforce of Wisdom, but..."

You waited, too scared to look her in the face. But you said, "I promise that I will win your hand, not go for Princess Toadstool's."

Zelda let out a sigh. Whether it was one of relief or exasperation, you had no idea.

"Fine... Let's go, Will," Zelda said, sounding like a weight on her shoulders had been taken off...

And replaced with a bigger one.

Within a few moments, you sat on the ground in front of the Triforce of Wisdom.

"Triforce of Wisdom, is there a way to restore Will's lost memories of the Mushroom Kingdom?" Zelda asked.

"There is, but it is a painful way, as the memories are encrypted, as Will took a warp back to the real world, not a warp pipe. A warp pipe would have let him keep his memories, but a warp allowed him to return to the very moment he left the real world," The Triforce of Wisdom said.

"How painful?" You asked.

"A headache strong enough to require rest for the remainder of the day," The Triforce of Wisdom answered.

It might've been your imagination, but the Triforce of Wisdom sounded... worried?

"You can back out of this, Will," Zelda said, sounding concerned.

You pondered your choices.

Now Nabooru frowned a little as she said, "The temple of Spirit has been lost for ages. Sand, erosion, and the Gerudo's exodus from Hyrule has done its damage."

"Just give me a moment," You said as you rummaged the room. Once you found a compass, you then said, "Now let me just go talk to the Triforces of Power and Wisdom. They'll enchant the compass to seek out the temple and then we can go reclaim the sage of Spirit powers for the Gerudo."

"Will! The party is still going strong. Come join us!" Zelda said.

Zelda pondered your question for a few moments before answering, "Normally, I'd say no, but with the Triforce of Power backing up the Triforce of Wisdom, it might be possible. Why do you ask?"

"Oh, just thinking about going on an adventure and making a few new friends on the way. I bet things will be peaceful enough to do it, now that Ganon's gone," You replied.

Zelda nodded before grabbing one of your hands and saying, "That's a good point, but we can talk to the Triforces later. Let's enjoy the party. It's not every day Ganon gets defeated once and for all"

1243221121312.content:
After the party, you and Zelda stood right in front of the two Triforces of Wisdom and Power. The Hylian Princess held your compass and asked, “So what place are you looking for?”

“The Spirit Temple where the Sage of Spirit gained her powers,” You answered

Zelda paused for a moment before she asked, “Why?”

You decided to be honest. “I met up with a Gerudo and she thanked me for assisting in the defeat of Ganon. We spoke some more and I agreed to see if we can help her regain the power of the Sage of Spirit. If we can do that, then we can look for other places and people who are potential sages.”

“A Gerudo? Did I see a… Oh, Nabooru. She seemed pretty nice, even though she seemed a bit underdressed…” Zelda muttered.

“The Gerudo tend to live in either desert areas or tropical places. They’re also like Ninjas,” You answered.

“You mean like my nursemaid Impa and her daughter?” Zelda asked.

“Are they called Sheikah?” You asked, “And what’s her Daughter’s name?”

“Yes to the first. As for her name, her name is also Impa. We call the mother Nana Impa to prevent confusion,” Zelda answered.

“Yes, they are similar. Both use special skills for fighting and disappearing and such. So can we get the compass enchanted?” You asked.

“I guess so. Just… Just wait until we also enchant a couple of mirrors, so we can talk with each other, alright?” Zelda asked back. You nodded, so Zelda grabbed a couple of handmirrors. “Triforces of Wisdom and Power, please enchant the compass to locate the Spirit Temple and enchant the mirrors to contact each other.”

“We shall grant these requests, so Will can go on his quest,” Triforce of Wisdom replied. Both Triforces glowed for a moment, then the objects glowed.

The Triforce of Power said, “There, as you requested.”

“Thank you,” Zelda and you said.

“Huh… being thanked feels kinda nice,” Triforce of Power muttered like it had been way too long since it received any kind words.

“So are you going on your journey right away?” Zelda asked, looking worried.

“No. First I’ll talk with Nabooru and plan out a few things, like clothes, food, water, transportation and such,” You explained. “It’ll probably take a day or two.”

“If you say so…” Zelda muttered, now looking jealous. She wanted to react like she did with Link when he tried to flirt with other girls. If you were a flirt, then she could get angry and punish you. She looked down and thought, ‘But you are trying to shore up diplomatic relations between Hylians and the Gerudo, as well as set up stronger forces for if Ganon somehow returned. Not only that, but there is no reason that we are expected to become a couple, as I am royalty and you are a commoner from another world. If I punish you for any of that, then I would be a poor ruler.’

You asked, “Is everything alright, Zelda?”

She wiped away a tear that was rolling down her cheek and answered, “Yes, I’m alright.”

“If you say so… I’ll go see Nabooru and set up a meeting for tomorrow, so we can plan our journey. Thank you for everything, Zelda,” You answered before you left.

A few minutes passed before Zelda laughed in a sad way and muttered, “Wasn’t that long ago that it was Link, Spryte and myself would go on a journey…”

"So... Princess Zelda's newest ally is trying to get a gift for her... for her Birthday..." Ganon growled. He cackled, "So let's help him. Let's help the love of their... relationship!"

Ganon teleported around, laughing harder each time.

With a wave of his hand, he created a necklace, one that was of rare and foreign materials. It even looked like it was from your world. Tossing the necklace at a Gibdo, he ordered, "Go make sure that sure that this... Will buys it."

"Eugh... how?" the Gibdo asked.

Ganon blasted the gibdo, putting the monster in the form of a beautiful female merchant. He bellowed to all the monsters of the underworld, "Monsters! Search the Dungeons for any items that can be sold and bring them here!"

===

The next day, you went to the Marketplace. you looked around, trying to find a gift for Zelda that she'd know it was from you.

"Hey, handsome. Need a gift fora girlfriend?" A hot merchant asked.

"Kinda. What do you have?" You asked.

She had various items. Swords, bracelets, bombs, arrows, potions, dresses... and a great looking necklace.

"I'll take it," You said, pointing at the necklace.

"Good eye," The merchant cooed.

===

When Zelda had her birthday, it was a Lavish ceremony, where many people from nearby countries gave her gifts. Even a few countries from across the sea gave a few gifts.

Link gave Zelda a new dress and she thanked him for it. Though he did try to ask for a kiss, she refused.

When you gave her your gift, she opened the box and loved the necklace. She said, "Oh, Will! Thank you! I'll put it on right now!"

So Zelda put on the necklace. Her feelings toward you were... enhanced, so to speak. She now...
12432213.title: Zelda's birthday

choices: It takes a few days for the spell to take it's effect on Zelda.

It hardy affects her at all.
124322131.content:
"Ohh,Will......" The animated Zelda cried out completely elated as she rushed right towards you."It's beautiful,thank you very much!" As much to your and Link's surprise she granted you a big hug and even longer kiss.

"Mwah!!" She gave you big smooch right on the lips.

"Gee thanks and you're welcome." You blushed bright red as your head was spinning,imagine being kissed by Princess Zelda of all people even if it was a badly written,crappy show she was in.

"Hey!" Link cried a bit annoyed and unsurprisingly envious at this scene which should have been him getting the smooch.

"I'm the hero here,I give you presents all the time Zelda and you don't even give me a simple peck on the cheek and all of a sudden this new boy pops up,buys you a plain looking necklace and he gets the royal treatment!"

"Well Link,It just so happens that Will gave this present from the bottom of his heart and asked for little in return." Zelda said firmly still with her arms wrapped around you tightly. "That's why he got his just reward. He's not totally demanding and pushy like you!"


"Well exccccccccccccccccccccccccccuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuussssssssssssseeeeeeeeee me Princess!" Link said his infamous catch phrase as usual.

"And that's another thing he's never seen calling me that twenty times a day,in fact he never said it once during all the time he's been here and that's why he gets a full sweet kiss from me and you get nothing." Zelda said angrily.

"Ahhhhhhhhhhh,this new guy is stealing my glory and stealing my girl!" Link grumbled to himself just as Spryte flew up to comfort her much larger than life love interest.

"Ohh poor Link,Don't worry you can buy me a bunch of presents and I'll give you a big kiss for each one!" The fairy said "Just ignore that snobby princess and that mean old boy,they're not as classy as you and I am Link!"

"Spryte, for the last time you're only two inches tall!" Link groaned as he walked away grumbling to himself as Zelda granted you another hug.

"Ohh Will,it's absolutely wonderful! I love it whatever did you buy this?" She gushed as she tried it on slipping it around her neck to admire it's gleaming beauty.

"Er I brought it from a local merchant here in the market place." You reply as you again blush red.

"Well I'll remember to give them my best regards and gratitude for creating such a stunning piece of jewelry. Thank you again I can't wait to show Daddy once I get back to the castle." As she ran back towards the direction of the castle and you sighed deeply touching the place where Zelda's kiss made quite the impact.
124322131.title: Was extremetly affectionate towards you, huggin...

refused. She took it well and told you she'd gladly wait

do nothing, as Link ran back in, angry at you
1243221311.content:
The next few days were interesting.

Zelda wore the necklace whenever you saw her. When she thought you weren't looking, she looked at herself in a mirror and posed for it. She still worked with you in re-discovering Hyrule history. She also kept teaching you about the various Hyrule customs and was learning Karate from you.

Spryte didn't appear as much, but continued to do so for the History rediscovery as you were told her job was Zelda's assistant. When she did appear outside of that, she was annoyed with you and Zelda. You suspected she was with Link most of the time.

Link kind of stopped sparring with you, claiming he was getting bored. He still stuck around to watch you teach Zelda Karate. If you had to guess, he was trying to learn Karate by observing it. Other than that, he kept his distance from you, going on short adventures, trying to find a better gift than the necklace.

He did make the odd complaint of the dungeons being cleaned out of... well, all items!

You walked into the main hall, where Link was pouring over the map of Hyrule that listed various dungeons.

"Perhaps I can come along on your next dungeon trip?" You asked, hoping to befriend him. Even if Link was annoying, he still was kind of your hero.

"And risk you giving another gift to Zelda?" Link asked with annoyance. He stood up and headed out the room. "No thanks. Spryte, let's get moving!"

"Right, Link!" Spryte said as she flew after Link.

You sighed, "I wonder if there's any way to stop Link from hating me?"

"Maybe fight him hand-to-hand like the ancient warriors of old, bellowing out all your problems with each other? I had similar problems with the king of Calatia and a fight was how we cleared the air," King Harkinian asked as he walked by.

You shook your head, "No. I think that will exacerbate the problem in this situation. He thinks I'm stealing Zelda and his glory. I'd rather settle things out peacefully with him."

The King shrugged before he left the room as well.

"And that's why I like you more than him!" Zelda cried out as she suddenly appeared and hugged you from behind, mashing her boobs against your back.

"Uh, thanks, Zelda," You said with a blush as Zelda walked around you, still pressing her bosom against you. "So... Why so affectionate?"

"I realized that you're a better match for me. Perhaps we can start dating?" Zelda cooed. "After all, that was going to be the next item for you to learn on your Hyrulian customs agenda. What better experience than a hands-on lesson? Especially when we add in some... 'extra credit'..."

You quickly took a step back, as Zelda groped your crotch.

"Eurm, Zelda? Aren't you moving a bit too fast? I mean, It's only been a few weeks since I came here. Sex is kinda...." You said as you put a chair between you and the approaching Zelda. "Too soon?"

Pushing the chair aside, Zelda said, "Oh, I'm ready for it. In fact, I'll make it a royal order. I order you to date me, Will."

"And if I don't?" You asked, quickly rolling over the large table to put it between you and the princess.

"I'll gladly wait then. You're worth it," Zelda cooed as she leaned against the table, trying to look sexy.

She was hot enough to it to look good.

After a few moments of thought, You decided to...
1243221311.title: The necklace : a few days later...

choices: Dashed back to the castle to set you free,confessing her love for you.
Continued on with Link to the Underworld
She is unsure what to do at this point.
12432213114.content:
Just as you were thinking of what to say Link suddenly raced back in,he apparently heard everything you and Zelda were doing and boy was he pissed.

":Hey what gives? What's going on?" He cried angrily pulling out his sword and pointing it directly at you.

"Link,nothing was going on between us!" Zelda tried her best explaining but still had stars in her eyes and hearts floating around her head Link noticed the way she was looking dreamily eyed at you and got even madder.

"Doesn't look like it from me! Yo...you do have a crush on this guy! Grrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr!" The hero of Hyrule was so unable to contain his rage he actually grabbed hold of the necklace around the princess' throat and pulled it off,it even broke off completely at the chain.

"That tears it! No one takes my girl and gets away without it!" As he pointed his blade at you and you began slowly backing up.

"Now,now Link....ta-take it easy believe me,I never wanted this in fact the princess came onto me hugging and flirting with me like crazy! Please don't......" As you were really scared as there was no telling what a single beam from that sword could do to you.

"Too late for apologies pal,you picked the last princess to flirt with...." Just as Zelda without warning grabbed his arm screaming.

"NO LINK DON'T!!"

"Huh? Princess-don't try and stop me!" Link screamed angrily as even Spryte looked terrified for a bit but Zelda managed to pull the sword from his grip.

"I'm not telling you,I'm ordering you,NOT TO HURT HIM! Now back away slowly." She said with fire in her green eyes Link threw a dirty look at you but did as she requested.

"Thank you now what's going on here?" She ordered sharply,her beautiful green eyes darting from one person to the other she seemed to come back to herself in a flash as there were no longer stars in her eyes or hearts floating over her head.

"This guy's been putting the moves on you Princess,he gave you this necklace to cause you to fall madly in love with you (pointing to it on the floor at her feet) but I think it's really a curse from Ganon himself."

"I-is this true?" As Zelda stared at it then directly at you,her green eyes flashing like fire.

"I....I........No! Of course not! princess...I-I wouldn't.............." You choked out. "It was a gift from me for your birthday remember?"

Zelda looked bewildered for a minute as if she was about to say she remembered but that cold frown returned and she cried out.

"Guards!" As two burly men dressed in thick armor came running into the room and the princess said the one thing you dreaded above all.

"Take him to the dungeon at once!!" Pointing directly at you as both men put heavy chains around your hands and feet as you cried out.

"Hey,hey Princess Zelda Please................No I Didn't...I-I couldn't....." But she shook her head sadly.

"I-I trusted you Will,I allowed you to stay in my father's kingdom and you would dare do this to me? And after all your fancy talk about Hyrule's history! And to think I actually believed you. Take him to the dungeon!" As she turned away but you could sense the hurt and sadness in her voice as Link didn't look one bit sorry,on the contrary he looked more happier and proud with this unfortunate outcome as you were led away you couldn't help but think.

"God what a jerk!" As you were placed in one of the smallest dungeon in the castle.


As both Link and Zelda were prepared to again head down into Ganon's underworld for another attempt to get the Triforce of Power when Zelda stopped briefly a good distance from the castle looking back at it with a concerned expression on her face.

"What's wrong Princess?" Link asked also pausing to look back at the girl he loved.

"Link,what if we made a mistake about Will? I can't help but keep thinking maybe I did do all those things without realizing it." As she put a finger on her chin.

"What do you mean Zelda? You didn't do anything wrong it was that Will guy." Link folded his arms in annoyance.

"But what if I did Link? I must admit ever since he arrived I...I have been strangely att..........." But her voice trailed off as she saw the hero in green's sudden frown.'

"What..y-you mean you actually developed a crush on him princess?" He choked out.

"And what if I have? I'm the royal princess here and I'm allowed to fall in love with whoever I want!" She snapped angrily. "But still I can't help but feel bad for what I did to him. Oh where's that necklace you showed me earlier? Give it to me!" She held out her hand and groaning to himself Link pulled out the necklace from his magic bag he kept all his items in to her.

"Strange there's nothing unusual about this necklace it looks like any other necklace but.....GASP!! There's definitely a great source of magic within this piece of jewelry.................Ohh Link,Will...We were all wrong about him! I was wrong. T-this is Ganon's work...he's using Will to get to the Triforce of Wisdom!" Zelda cried out as she dropped the necklace on purpose to the ground.

"Yeah so,what were you expecting princess,that's what ole Pig-Face does! Anyway forget about him and let's go get the Triforce of Wisdom!" Link said as he again prepared to leave but Zelda......
12432213114.title: do nothing, as Link ran back in, angry at you

choices: You get freed.
Turns out they were darknuts! You, Zelda, and Spryte are captured!
Zelda gets shoved in with you! the guard claimed orders from the real Zelda?
something else.
124322131141.content:
"I need to check something about Will. After all, tricking us into arresting an innocent person would be something Ganon would do," Zelda said before she turned around and began to walk to the castle.

Link grabbed Zelda and said, "Zelda, we can do that when we come back. Let's go beat Pignose and get the Triforce of power!"

Shaking Link's hand off, Zelda replied, "No. I refuse. Father might go ahead and banish him while I'm with you in the underworld."

"So no big loss!" Link said with a shrug.

Before he could grab her, Zelda ran to the castle.

===

In the dungeon, You lookedaround.

There was a guard walking by every ten minutes or so.

The cell you were in had some wooden planks attached to the wall as a bed. A hole in the floor as a toilet. There was little else in the cell.

Spryte suddenly appeared. You asked, "Come to gloat?"

"No... well, maybe a little," Spryte answered. "I believe that you know a lot of Hyrule's history, but I think Link was a bit out of line. He never should've tried to attack you."

"And me getting arrested?" you asked.

"You deserve it for making Link mad," Spryte answered as she flew in the cell. Zelda arrived in the Dungeon with the Triforce of Wisdom. Spryte continued, "But I don't think you allied with Ganon. For one, you're on your own, no personal guard."

From her hiding spot, Zelda nodded.

Spryte continued. "You were summoned from another world BY Zelda, not Ganon. If Ganon could access other worlds, we'd be in a whole lot of trouble! You being with Ganon doesn't make sense."

"So I'm Ganon's patsy? Is that what you're saying?" You asked.

"Pretty much. I'll try to get Zelda and argue for her, but stop making Link mad!" Spryte demanded.

"I haven't deliberately done anything to make Link mad! I looked up to him and his family as heroes! But no! He goes and acts like a jerk, simply because I'm helping Zelda learn some of Hyrule's lost history and Karate!" You ranted, making Spryte and Zelda pause. You sat on the bench and leaned back. You sighed, "Honestly, I don't know how to prove I'm innocent and how to make Link not get mad at me."

""Well, I can help with the innocence part," Zelda said, bringing the Triforce of Wisdom. "Have you ever worked with Ganon?"

"Never in my life. I pity him more than anything else. He's the angry greedy shards of a man long dead," You answered.

"Did you know the necklace had any kind of magic in it?" Zelda asked with a stern look.

"No. If I did, I would have smashed it myself and warned you of it," You answered.

"Triforce of Wisdom?" Zelda asked.

"All answers that Will has said are true and are without falsehood or trickery," The Glowing pyramid said.

"I see... Guards, release Will," Zelda ordered a trio of armored knights.

choices: Zelda ask you on a date
Something else

12432214.title: something else.

choices: "Dr. Nerdnick is building a robosuit for a King that recently arrived."
"We're under attack by RoboKoopa! I'm looking for help!"
"We're celebrating King Koopa's defeat!"
"Dr. Nerdnick received a broken robot that looks like Princess Toadstool."
she said something else.
13.content:
Your name is Y/N and you are a bit of a tech head. You kind of had a fascination for older games and making/playing mods for them if you could.

One day, your parents decided to kick you out, since you were 18 years old and out of school.

To 'help you' find a new place, they sold all your things and gave you the money they got for all of it. They didn't tell you until after the fact.

You walked away with only the clothes on your back and your smartphone. You doubted you'd ever speak to them again.

As you passed by an alley, you heard the sound of a warp pipe from the Super Mario game. You looked and indeed, there was a green pipe sticking out of the ground.

So you carefully walked up to it, wondering if it was a prank or not. At best, you had your first bit of furniture, a table that looked like a warp pipe.

You tapped it with your knuckles a few times.

"Definitely metal," You muttered before leaning above it.

It... stretched down for a long distance. In fact, there appeared to be a cup-sized opening that seemed to be...sky?

You put your hand in, just to see if it was oil-based paint or a velvet painting.

Then it happened. Some force seemed to grab your arm pul you in.

You screamed for help as you were pulled through the pipe. As the other end came closer and closer, you saw that it lead to open sky.

Eventually, you reached the other end of the Warp Pipe.

but instead of being shot out like a bullet, you stopped the moment your upper body was out of the pipe. To your relief, there wasn't any whiplash from the sudden stop.

The land around you was what the 1980's thought what a futuristic city looked like. There were building that looked like machines and elevated walkways all over the place.

Then someone walked into your line of sight.

It took a moment for you to recognize them, but it was Bunsen from the Super Mario Bros Super show. ▼
https://www.mariowiki.com/Bunsen


"I'm... in that old show?" you muttered, getting Bunsen's attention.

"Oh, a human. My name is Bunsen. Who are you?" The somewhat cute robot asked as she walked over to you.

"My name is Y/N. I think I need help getting out of this warp pipe," You answered. As Bunsen helped you out of it, you asked, "So.. I'm new here. What's the current news?"

Bunson answered, "Well, the latest news is that..."
13.title: Player 3 - In Robo Land

choices: You went to the Mushroom Kingdom
You stayed in Robo Land.
You travel the various Video Game Land
131.content:
Bunson answered, "Well, the latest news is that Dr. Nerdnick is building a robosuit for a King that recently arrived."

"...King? Do... you know what the King's name is?" You asked, a look of horror, shock, and surprise ran about your face.

"Uh, no. I was not told by Dr. Nerdnick," Bunsen answered.

"We need to get to the doctor in a hurry. I think I know who the King is and they definitely are not a good person," You replied.

"Who is the King, then?" Bunsen asked as she put her hands on her hips, apparently not believing you.

"King Koopa, leader of the Koopa Troopa. He's a slimy disgusting, ugly, conniving, cruel, big time meanie! Go ahead, send a message to any of the lands you can contact to learn if he's on the level or not. Heck, go call the Super Mario Brothers or Princess Toadstool," You answered. "As for King Koopa's description, think a large turtle with a lot of spikes and wearing a crown. His face kinda looks like an ox's.face."

"I'll check," Bunsen replied as she walked over to a building and pressed a panel, which caused the panel to flip over and reveal a computer terminal. She typed away for some time. When a video of Dr. Nerdnick's lab appeared, she pressed a few more times to access the security tapes. When King Koopa appeared on the screen, she gasped. "He looks even worse than you described!"

"Then let's stop Dr. Nerdnick from making a mistake!" You said as Bunsen flipped back the Terminal.

===

Ina few minutes, you entered Dr. Nerdnick's lab, where the scientist in question was working on the robosuit's body.

Bunsen cried out, "Dr. Nerdnick! You're making a big mistake! Don't build that for King Koopa!"

After Dr. Nerdnick uttered his gibberish, Bunsen interpreted, "He's asking how could he be making a mistake? The Robosuit is to help promote peace."

"I don't think making something that can produce Bob-ombs and Bullet Bills is very peaceful. In fact, I can only think evil purposes for such inventions," You replied.

Dr. Nerdnick shrugged and said more gibberish. Bunsen interpreted, "He said, 'You got a point, but how can we make sure that King Koopa is evil?'"

"Add in a function where if he targets anyone with the weapons, the robosuit turns into a prison cell," You answered.

Dr. Nerdnick nodded before saying more gibberish and getting back to work on the robotsuit. Bunsen said, "He said no problem. It can be done in a jiffy."

===

"So this is my robotsuit?" King Koopa asked as Dr. Nerdnick led him into the completed Robosuit. You and Bunsen waited nearby in an escape tunnel.

Dr. Nerdnick nodded.

"Great!... How do I get in?" King Koopa asked. Dr. Nerdnick pressed a button and the Robosuit unfolded. King Koopa entered the unfolded suit and the suit folded back up. "Mwua-ha-ha-ha! Now Ican take over Robo Land!"

He aimed a hand at Dr. Nerdnick. King Koopa briefly wondered why the good docker was unphased, but shrugged it off. But when the horned Koopa got ready to press the Bullet Bill button...

The Robosuit immediately changed into a prison cell that vagly looked like the Robosuit.

"Why you... You... You! You sneaky underhanded labcoat-wearing pansy! How dare you trick me when I'm trying to trick you!" King Koopa bellowed, trying to pull the call bars apart. He paused and muttered, "Man, I wish I was the one to think of this."

Dr. Nerdnick uttered some gibberish. Bunsen interpreted, "He said we can come out now and that we should contact the Super Mario Brothers about King Koopa's capture."

You nodded and so Bunsen opened the escape Tunnel's door to the lab. Bunsen walked over to a phone and quickly dialed. "Hello, is this the Mushroom Kingdom? It is? Good! I wish to report the capture of King Koopa, all thanks to Y/N's plans!"

You smiled, feeling good that you captured the villainous King Koopa.

===

"When I get out of here, you'll all pay! Oh boy, will you all pay! Especially you, Mario, you pasta-eating drainbrain!" King Koopa yelled, still shaking the bars as it was being transported to the Banishment Zone. "And I have a special punishment in store for that Wimp, Y/N!"

"Thanks, Y/N! We've been trying to capture King Koopa since forever!" Toad said, shaking your hand.

"Yeah! Let's go celebrate with an all-you-can-eat pasta contest!" Mario said.

"That I can get behind, brother!" Luigi said,high-fiving Mario.

"So where did you come from, Y/N?" Toadstool asked.

"Erhm, Well, the Real World. But my parents sold almost of my things and kicked me out of their home, so I kinda don't have any reason to go back," You answered. Both Toadstool and Bunsen's hearts felt for you. You produced your smartphone and said, "Other than the clothes I'm wearing, this is my only belonging. It's a phone, music player, video player and a bit more."

"Well, if you let Dr.Nerdnick look at it, your smartphone will work with anything in Robo Land," Bunsen said.

"I promise that there will always be a place for you in the Mushroom Kingdom, Y/N. Come with me and I will personally insure that you will have a home to your personal specifications," Toadstool said.

Bunsen frowned for a moment before she smiled and said, "If living space is a concern, then you can live near or even with me! Robo Land was made for human and robot cohabitation! In fact, your plan that defeated King Koopa has some robots wondering if you'd like to be leader!"

You thought about it for a few moments.

Toadstool was cuter and more human-like, but you knew that King Koopa would return and cause more trouble. There was also the concern that you might be personally selected to help teach the cavemen in Dinosaur Land.

Bunsen could probably upgrade herself to look more human and she was quite helpful, but you were afraid to be accused of being a 'robosexual'. The idea of being Leader of Robo Land was intriguing, but a bit scary.

Or you could go explore the Lands of the Video Game Land and not have to worry about King Koopa or helping Cavemen.

Little did you know that whatever your choice was, Bunsen planned on staying with you, as she gained a crush on you because of both your plan to defeat Koopa and the fact you treated her like a person.
131.title: Robo Land : Koopa's defeat

choices: "Toadstool says the real world is under attack by King Koopa's kids."
"Toadstool wants us to take care of a robot double of herself."
"Toad was on the line. he said the princess is missing!"
1312.content:
"Princess Toadstool, As much as I would like to accept your offer, I will have to refuse. I will be staying in Robo Land," You said.

Bunsen smiled, while Toadstool frowned and asked, "Why?"

Not wanting to reveal too much about future shows, you said, "Because I don't think King Koopa will stay in the Banishment Zone for long. Bunsen, is there a way for me to create powerups for Mario, Luigi, and Toadstool?"

"Yes, but such work will take time," Bunsen answered.

"What if I had an idea of what the powerups looked like and what they could do?" You asked.

"That would streamline creation quite a bit, but it still would take time," Bunsen said.

"I do appreciate being cautious, but please reconsider my offer, Y/N," Toadstool requested.

"I can do more good here. If we prepare for his return, then we can trap him faster,. We can make the world safer," You replied.

"There is a quote from the real world I think fits. 'Those who would give up essential Liberty, to purchase a little temporary Safety, deserve neither Liberty nor Safety'. Keep that in mind, Y/N," Toadstool said.

You said, "And here is another quote, 'The price of freedom is eternal vigilance'. To assume Koopa will never escape is practically taunting him!"

"Do not worry, Princess Toadstool. I and several others will make sure Y/N won't go overboard," Bunsen said as she hugged your arm.

Toadstool's hands curled into fists. She said, "See that you do, Bunsen. I will be joining Mario and Luigi in their contest."

===

For the next few months, you enjoyed life in Robo Land. You learned how to make flying motorcycles and how to ride them.

Which was weird, as trying to duplicate your smartphone kept running into all sorts of problems, like power, weight, and shape.

Bunsen proved to be an excellent assistant. She recorded any ideas that you so much as muttered and was quick to remind you to take a break and eat if you skipped a meal. If you got injured, she was quick to heal you.

As for Powerups, you managed to create the powerups from Super Mario Bros 3 and Super Mario world.

Then there was a security break by Koopa Troopas and you lost a large number of them.

"It happens, Y/N. At least the powerup boxes will ensure your powerups will always be there if they are needed anywhere in the world," Bunsen said, trying to cheer you up.

"Yeah... I guess. It still sucks, though." You replied. "So what's the news?"

"Remember what you said you would stay here? Well, you were right. King Koopa broke out, but not only that, he revealed he has seven kids to help him conquer the world!" Bunsen said in a worried voice.

"Can't say I didn't see that happening. So shall we send a message to Princess Toadstool that we are ready to help if she needs us?" You asked.

"I'll get right on it," Bunsen said with a salute.

"Before you do, how is the Auto-doc's progress?" You asked.

"Well, it can heal injuries and identify illnesses, but that's about it," Bunsen answered.

"What about magical illnesses and transformations?" You asked.

"They still fall under the category of illnesses. Dr. Nerdnick sped up progress for magical ailments cures the moment he heard King Koopa broke out," Bunsen answered.

"Good. Contact the princess," You replied.

Bunsen opened her heart-panel on her chest and took out a phone. "Hello, Princess Toadstool? This is Bunsen. I'm calling on behalf of Y/N to let you know we are ready to form an alliance with you if you need one."

After a few moments, she said, "Y/N, I have some news..."
1312.title: You stayed in Robo Land.

choices: "We can fix her up and let her become a Robo Land citizen
"At best. She's spare parts. Can I have them?"
"We can make a drone and a special helmet for Toadstool to control it."
"Err... Error. Koopa Virus detected. OBEYING KING KOOPA."
13122.content:
After a few moments, she said, "Y/N, I have some news.Princess Toadstool wants us to take care of a robot double of herself. It's been destroyed... by a tital wave in the middle of the Mushroom Kingdom? How can that be? It's all dry land there!"

"I blame Warp pipes. Shall we pick up the destroyed robot or will they be delivering her?" You asked.

Bunsen asked the phone, "Pick up or delivery?"

After a few moments, Bunsen said, "She'd like you to pick it up, as well as you delivering some more improved walkie-talkies."

"Right," you nodded.

===

Toadstool was helping Toad put the Robot Princess ▼
https://www.mariowiki.com/Robot_Princess...
in a box that could contain all the parts.

Holding the head, Toadstool asked, "So that's what I look like? I'm not too crazy about the black lipstick. I'm more of a fan of my shade of pink-ish red.... Maybe for a halloween costume..."

"You done with that head, yet? It's getting creepy that you're looking at it for so long," Toad asked.

You are Will, a 17 year old boy. You were helping your parental guardian clean out a garage of their friends. You had parents, but they just... disappeared one day.

"I am Will," you answered.

"Third question. Where did you get these?" Samus asked rather quickly.

"From a garage sale," You answered.

"Fourth question, What are your plans?" Samus asked.

"I guess explore and see if I can find my parents. They've been missing for a long time," You answered.

After a few moments, Samus sighed and said, "I probably shouldn't, but I'll free you. If only because this comic allowed me to remember what happened when the Space Pirates managed to capture me. You have no idea just how relieved I was to find out that I didn't capture Princess Lana's father. Reading your comics brought that memory right back."
