So either they ran off or...

Someone learned to kill them in one blow.

"No. I refuse to beleive that. My minion merely ran off," Ganon said to himself. "Grr... I will get to the bottom of this! I bet that Link is helping them, so I have less minions to attack him with!"

"So is that the Triforce of power?" a voice asked.

"Who is that?" Ganon growled as he teleported to the Triforce of Power. Once he saw you and a number of Koopas armed with bows, Ganon said, "You.... You're the real worlder that Koopa had an interest in. What are you doing here?"

Your answer was a simple one.

"Fire."

Ganon shrieked as his body was riddled with Holy Arrows, all 'borrowed' from the world of Kid Icarus.

You theorized that since the Silver Arrow from the Zelda games was probably holy powered, then Arrows from Palutena would work just as well.

As Ganon was reduced to dust, your theory was sound.

"What now, your maliciousness?" A koopa asked in his friendly voice as he saluted.

"Put the ashes in one of the holy-powered boxes, and call me boss," You answered as you walked over to the Triforce of Power. "Hello there."

"What do you want?" The Triforce of Power replied.

"Koopa kinda screwed me out of beign a hero and made me look like a bad guy, so I embraced it," You said back. "I'd like your help with that."

"What happened to King Koopa?" The Triforce of Power asked.

"He died when I shrunk him with some mini-mushrooms and gave him a lava bath," You answered.

"That's more progress than what Ganon has done in decades," The Triforce of Power muttered. "Very well. I shall lend you my aid."

"Can you become smaller? Easier to carry and hide?" You asked.

"Other than taking residence in your soul, no." The Triforce of Power replied.

"Will be able to draw upon your power?" You asked.

"Yes," The Triforce of Power answered.

"That'll do," You said as you held out your hand, as if to shake someone else's."

The Triforce of Power glowed before it vanished. A Trio of Triangles appeared on the back of your hand, with the one on the top filled in with gold.

"Thank you, Triforce of Power," you said as it vanished from sight.

"What now, boss?" Mouser asked.

You thought for a few moments before you decided...
15323.title: Taking power

choices: Dedede
Morrigan
Medusa
153231.content:
"I need generals. Subordinates that can lead on my behalf when I'm not around. Only when I'm confident in my army's leadership will I feel comfortable going any further." You tell Mouser.

"Well boss, we have plenty of skilled leaders among our ranks as it is. I can vouch for several squad commanders that would be excellent generals for your mighty cause. We also have the Koopalings, who already have respect among the men." Mouser replies.

"I appreciate the input Mouser and I would very much like to look into these commanders of yours, but I need something new. You lot are strong when led properly, but Mario and the other heroes know how you fight when led by Koopa and his Koopalings. Some fresh leadership will catch them off guard." You retort.

"Very well boss. If I may then, I also know of a few that may be good additions to the army." He says.

"Go ahead."

"First is King Dedede. He can bring his own army to the table and has very few ambitions so long as he is left to rule Dreamland and his nemesis Kirby is destroyed. He is also a powerhouse in his own right. He can certainly be a valuable ally." He lists off.

"Interesting, who else?" You ask.

"Next is Lady Morrigan. As a succubus, she is quite powerful, and since she is a noble, she has leadership experience. Plus, milord may enjoy some... company from a woman like her." You blush a little at that part but keep it hidden as Mouser continues. "So long as you keep her happy, she'll work for us just fine."

"A nice pick. Anyone else?" You ask.

"Lastly, I recommend Medusa. A being that can challenge the divine is certainly someone worth recruiting. She commanded her underworld troops near flawlessly and even had Palutena captured for a time." He finishes.

Who do you recruit first?
153231.title: To gather a few people to be your generals.

choices: "You got it. You're my right hand."
"I'll wait until I get a few more generals to decide."
You didn't say anything, as Morrigan began to make out with you
something else.
1532312.content:
"I think Morrigan might be the most useful out of those choices. As a succubus, she can easily hypnotize many of the male heroes and perhaps a number of the female ones," You said.

"Very well. I shall lead you to the warp that leads to the world she's in," Mouser replied.

"First things first. I need to test something," You said, wanting a certain spell, you thought, 'Power is knowledge and Knowledge is power.'

Almost immediately, A spell that would make whoever hit by it immune to hypnosis and mindcontrol came to your mind. As you prepared to cast it, you said, "Ah, so The Triforce of Wisdom isn't the only reservoir of spells. That one merely has the benefit of knowing what spells before you need them and an assistant to sort through the spells."

"W-what are you doing?" Mouser asked, taking a step back.

"Making you all immune to mindcontrol," You said, casting the spell.

All of your troops sighed with relief. A Koopa Troopa said, "Wow, that's pretty nice. Thanks!"

"You're welcome," You said. "While I'm out recruiting, scout around and see if anyone is willing to join us."

"It might be only Keese and Ropes, but alright," The Koopa Troopa replied

===

Morrigan sighed as she landed on the top of a large building, "Pyron's been favoring Demitri as of late and I haven't found any decent victims to eat. Felicia's been protecting that Harry Grimoire way too closely."

"How about joining a new boss?" A voice asked, making Morrigan turn around.

Morrigan briefly was shocked at someone sneaking up on her, but quickly leaned against the railing in a sexy pose and asked with a seductive smile, "Who are you?"

"My name is Alexander, but call me Alex. I'm looking for a few people to be generals in my army and for one of them to be my right hand. Y'know, the one that leads in my stead if I am somewhere else."

"So who's your right hand?" Morrigan asked.

"I like to think I'm looking at her," You said.

Morrigan's smile gained a prideful feel as she said. "Sounds intriguing, but I'd like to see this army and if you're man enough for me to follow."

You chuckled as you thought, 'Power is knowledge and Knowledge is power.'

A list of spells came to mind. You created a portal that lead to King Koopa's your castle as you said, "Very well, I took the castle from someone who tried to ruin my life, so I took his army and property."

"Oh... Interesting," Morrigan said, plans fluttering through her mind, both to wrap you around her finger and to take over your army.

"Keep in mind my troops might appear to look... 'cute', but they are competent," You explained.

"So what are they? Imps? Goblins? Gremlins?" Morrigan asked as she followed after you. Upon seeing Koopa Troopas, Goombas, and other mario enemies, she said, "Oh.... Turtles, mushrooms, snakes, birds, Mice,and other cute things."

"Hey! Watch what you say! I'm a mad Bomber!" Mouser said before tossing a cartoon bomb at the succubus. It exploded, leading her covered in soot.

"Hey!" Morrigan cried out, getting ready to attack.

"Silence!" You said in a booming voice, aided by a spell. Using another spell to clean the room and the succubus, you said,"Morrigan, I can boost you. Allow you to feed off more than just life force."

"Such as?" Morrigan asked, curious if you could deliver what you offered.

"The act of sex would feed you, as being excited would do the same," You said, thinking, 'And such spells would alter your personality and body to be more like the video game version, as well as make you genuinely loyal to me.'

"Prove it," Morrigan said.

So with a wave of your hands, you cast the promised upgrade spell on her.

Morrigan fell to her knees, letting out an orgasmic cry as she felt her body change. She hugged herself to make her boobs look bigger as she said in a way that sounded like another orgasm was on the way, "You... You... You... got yourself a general!"

"That's good to hear, You said as Morrigan cried out as the changes finished.

She stood up like nothing had happened and said, "I do hope I'll be your right hand, master."

"Call me Boss, Morrigan." You said, looking around. Even though you made them immune to her mindcontrol gaze, you army still blushed at the sight of her. "As for if you're my right hand..."
1532312.title: Morrigan

choices: Samus
Meta Knight
Wario Bros
15323122.content:
"Forgive me m'lady, but until I have gathered the reminder of my generals, I am unsure who will be my personal right hand. For now, know that you hold high position in my army and court and have the authority that follows." You tell her, making her whine a bit.

"But master, would it not be wise for your first general to be your second-in-command?" She asks.

"Perhaps. But that's to decide later. Use this as incentive to give me one hundred and ten percent in following my orders. Perhaps if you serve me well, I'll let you share my bed with me." She blushes a bit at your offer. "And again, call me boss for now."

"Very well boss. What will you have me do first?" She asks with a bow.

"Return to the Koopa Kingdom with a portion of my army. There are seven Koopalings in command of air fleets across the kingdom, as well as the former prince running around. I want all eight of them brought before me when I return from recruiting my other generals." You order.

"Very well boss. It will be done." Taking a small contingent of your men, she sets off for the warp back to your castle.

"So boss, who shall we visit next? There are still two others left that would prove promising." Mouser asks.

"Neither, I'm afraid. Dedede and his men are too easy to manipulate and deceive by his enemies to be of use to me. As for Medusa, even with you lot immune to mind control, I worry about her attempting to overthrow me. I need new options, so let's hear them Mouser." You order.

"W-well, there are few candidates that we can trust with the power to make use of it, but I'll try. Perhaps the legendary Samus Aran would serve us well?" He suggests.

"Isn't she a hero?" You ask.

"Not exactly. Remember, she is a bounty hunter by trade. She'll work for anyone if the pay is well. It just so happens that her contracts usually align with the heros." He says.

"Interesting, next?"

"Well, perhaps if you do not wish for Dedede's army, we can instead overthrow him and recruit his retainer, Meta Knight. While you may be a villain by name, you are still quite just to us. Perhaps that justness will convince him to side with you? He even brings his own battleship to the fight. He would be a fine addition." He suggests.

"Another fine option, who else?"

"Well, similar to Samus, we can recruit the Wario Brothers and ensure their loyalty with riches." He offers up.

"Hmm, not a great choice, but worth considering."

Who do you go after next?
15323122.title: "I'll wait until I get a few more gener...

choices: Captain Syrup
King Koopa's Kids.
Palutena
something else happens
153231221.content:
"I'll go hire Samus. Send someone to get a bag of gold coins and Rupees," You ordered. "In the meantime, feel free to loot the place. Anything nice looking, feel free to keep it for yourself!"

"Do you need us to contact her or find her?" Mouser said as he and the others began to loot the underworld.

"No. Once I have the bags, I can teleport," You said.

===

Samus was on another 'destroy Mother Brain's schemes' for both the Space Federation and Princess Lana.

Blowing up another group of Space Pirates, Samus sighed as she thought, 'I miss Kevin. Ever since he got serious with Lana, they've been inseparable. Why couldn't Kevin be my partner? I can easily make use of Captain N's knowledge better than Lana. So what if it would be more for money?'

Samus paused when she saw a man with two large bags in his hands. Aiming her suit's arm cannon at you, she asked, "Who are you?"

"Will. I wish to hire you for a semi-permanent basis, but with a caveats that allows you to quit at any time. You'd still go on whatever bounty hunting missions you want," You said as you held up the bags. "I currently hold the territories once held by King Koopa and Ganon. Thus I have more than enough to hire you, if you let me."

"Forgive me, but I need proof," Samus said, her suit's scanners telling her that the bags held a large amount of Gold coins and Rupees. Enough so that your offer was tempting.

You put the bags down and raised your left hand, letting the Triforce of power glow as you said, "This is the Triforce of power.

Samus's suit did report that a large amount of power was now detected within your body.

"As for Koopa, when I appeared in Video Game Land, he spread rumors and faked evidence that I was some sort of evil mastermind," You said, handing one such photo. "So I tossed a few mini-mushrooms into his mouth and threw him into lava. I then barked a few orders to take control of his minions. Of course, I also gave them sick days, vacation days, and a few other sweet deals to ensure loyalty."

"So... King Koopa spread rumors you were evil and your response was to become evil and take over?" Samus asked as she looked at the photo. Her suit scanned the photo and she muttered,"Huh... Enchanted photoshop. I can see how most people would fall for it."

"There's a difference. I've been aiming my attacks at evil," You said. It was true, at least for the moment. "but if you'd like, I can wait until you're done with your current bounty mission to decide on my offer. You can take the bags, regardless of whether you accept my offer or not."

Samus still aimed her arm cannon at you for a few moments before lowering it. "I'll think about it."

So Samus took the bags and somehow put them in some subspace her suit had before she left.

You sat on a rock and smiled. You knew there was a good chance she'd refuse, so you enchanted various missiles and energy tanks in the general area. The magic would make her more willing to accept your offer.

And once she would accept, you'd give her a ring that would continue to enforce the magic, even when she took off her armor.

===

Some time later at your castle, Mouser watched as Samus's ship landed. The ship door opened up and you and Samus left it.

"So you really do have his forces..." Samus muttered.

"Yes and we can prepare a room for you," You said.

"Hnn, no. I can stay in my ship. Thanks for the ring though," Samus replied.

"Boss, Morrigan came back with someone that tried to attack her," Mouser said.

"Oh? Who?" You asked. Depending on who it was, you might be able to bribe them.
153231221.title: hiring a bounty hunter

choices: Gather your generals
The Koopalings attack
Something else
1532312211.content:
"She calls herself Captain Syrup, boss. She claims to be some big-time pirate." Mouser explains.

"A pirate huh? Sounds promising. Bring me to her." You order.

"Yes boss." He replies as you two begin to set off. Before that, you turn back to Samus.

"An important issue has come up. You are free to explore the castle as you please. I'll send men to find you when this is over so we can discuss your contract proper." You tell her.

"Alright then. I could use some downtime after that last bounty." She replica. With that out of the way, you and Mouser continue on.

*****

Mouser leads you to the Koopa Castle dungeon, where Morrigan awaits you in front of a large cell. Seeing your approach, Morrigan runs up and kneels in front of you. "I'm sorry boss, I was in the middle of battle with Bully Koopa and his fleet. We were just about to capture him when these pirates opened fire on us. Bully got away, but we were able to capture their captain." She explains.

"It's alright Morrigan. Bully and the others will come later. For now, let's see about this pirate of yours." You tell her with a reassuring pat on the head.

You approach the cell with your new captive in it. She sat there silently as you walked up with her hands bound behind her back. "Captain Syrup, I presume?" You ask her.

"That's me. What's it to you handsome?" She asks back.

"Let's start with why you attacked my army right when they were about to claim a major victory, shall we?" You ask as you sit in front of the bars.

"Not much to say. I saw the battle and figured I could use the chaos to grab some prince or commander and sell him off for a huge ransom. So I ordered my crew to open fire on your succubus and her troops. What I didn't expect was for the other guys to turn tail and run the second we started shooting. In the end, they got away and I got caught. That's about all there is to it." She explains.

You hear her tale and soak in her words. "So tell me Syrup, if you had command of a larger fleet, better troops, and clearer incentive, would you have done any better?" You ask.

"Uhhh, I mean, I guess so. I've only ever had the one ship and my men, and I only work for treasure or ransom." She replies.

"Boss, you are seriously...?" Morrigan starts before you cut her off.

"I have confidence in her skills. So Syrup, I'm giving you a choice. You can either join me as my third and final general, where I can promise you vast rewards and power. Or, you can sit in this cell and rot for the reminder of your days. Your choice." You tell her.

"Is that even a choice? Of course I'll join. Heck, promise treasure and I'll join without this whole bondage foreplay." She tells you.

"And I trust that you'll give me your absolute loyalty?" You ask.

"As long as you keep the gold coming, I'll give you everything I have." She answers. You motion for the guards to open her cell and uncuff her. She rises to meet your eye. "Deal?" She asks with outstretched hand.

"Deal." You meet her grip.

What happens next?
1532312211.title: Recruiting a Pirate

choices: Morrigan protects you
Morrigan goes off to attack Bully.
Morrigan takes you to help her attack Bully
something else happens
15323122112.content:
A goomba ran in, crying, "Boss, boss! The Koopalings are within sight and are in attack position!"

You looked towards Captain Syrup and asked, "Were I to give you Koopa's Doom ship and the crew for it, can you adapt to it?"

"A flying ship? THAT Flying ship? Now you got my loyalty!" Captain Syrup cooed, her eyes showing stars. "And yes, I'll adapt fast. The SS Tea Cup wasn't my first ship, after all."

"You'll have an ally. Samus Aran in her ship," You said before you glanced towards Mouser and ordered, "Lead Captain Syrup to her new ship."

"As the usual first mate of King Koopa's Doom ship, I say, Aye Aye, Boss!" Mouser replied with a salute.

As Mouser led Syrup away, you looked at the Goomba and said, "Get our forces to man the cannons and ready for any invasions."

"Right, boss!" The Goomba croaked before running out of sight.

You then took out a walkie-talkie and said, "Samus, we got trouble. Seven doom ships worth, Over!"

"This is Samus. Any allies? Over." Samus's voice crackled.

"Captain Syrup in Koopa's doom Ship. I told her you're an ally. There's also the Castle's own defenses. Do you need to know who to attack? Over." You answered.

"Nah, Koopa's Doom Ship is pretty famous. Over," Samus's voice replied.

"I'll keep this line open in case anything happens, over," you said.

"And what of me?" Morrigan cooed as she hugged you from behind and pressed her boobs against you.

"You can either stay by my side to protect me or go finish your battle with Bully Koopa," You replied.

"Hmmm.... Tough choice..." Morrigan cooed.
15323122112.title: The Koopalings attack and your preparations

choices: Let them approach the castle, use your defenses
Go out and fight alone
Feign surrender
153231221122.content:
"Sorry boss, but I have to finish things up with that pink punk." Morrigan answers. "Besides, you're strong enough to handle anything a pack of spoiled brats throws your way."

"Very well then." You say before turning the walkie-talkie back on. "What's going on with their fleets?" You call out to the paratroopa in charge.

"They seem to be splitting up boss. It looks like they are trying to surround us. Two koopa fleets in every direction." He reports.

"Can you tell who's fleet is where?" You ask.

"Easily boss. Every Koopaling commander has unique flags to show who's leading. We have Bully and Kootie Pie's fleets to the south." He starts.

"I'll march out to engage them boss, if that's okay?" Morrigan asks. You give her a nod to signal the go ahead and she takes off to rally some troops.

"Next?"

"Hip and Hop boss. Both of their fleets are coming from the east. Big Mouth and Cheatsy are attacking from the west. Lastly, the northern fleets are commanded by Kooky and Koopa Jr." He reports.

"This is Syrup, I've boarded the Doom Ship and awaiting your orders." You hear Syrup's voice on the line.

"You'll be engaging Big Mouth and Cheatsy in the West. Samus, I want you on Hip and Hop in the east." You order.

"Affirmative." Samus replies.

"Aye aye." Syrup answers. "But what about you?"

"I'll be giving the young prince his spanking." You tell her. "And by the way, whatever happens to the crews are not my concern. I would prefer to keep as many alive as possible, but you are free to act as you please. But no matter what, I want all eight Koopalings brought before my throne at the end of the battle, alive. Understood?"

"Of course sir."
"Roger."
"Got it."

With everyone up to speed, you prepare for your coming battle with the prince and his little bodyguard.

How will you do it?
153231221122.title: Morrigan goes off to attack Bully.

choices: Skip to when you won and had the Koopalings in your throne room
Go watch Samus fight Hip and Hop
Morrigan's fight with Bully Koopa and Kootie Pie
something else happens
1532312211221.content:
You headed to the roof the the castle, where a number of cannons were.

As Kooky and Koopa Jr's doomships came closer, you put your hand on a Bill Blaster and used the Triforce of Power's power to boost it up.

Looking at the Koopa Troopas, Goombas, and shy guys, you said, "Kooky may have created a number of inventions on the Doom ships, but I have faith that all of you will overcome the Koopalings. After all, I gave you days off, sick days, decent pay, vacations, holiday pay,and so much more. If the Koopalings win, then you all know what they will do."

The cheers from all the forces, even the Bullet Bills, was heartening.

"Fire when ready!" You ordered as you aimed your enchanted Bill Blaster at Koopa Jr's Doom ship and fired. "After I'm certain the enhancement spell is safe, I'll cast it on all of your Bill Blasters!"

When the Doomships were just within range, you fired.

The Bullet Bill you fired was a Furious Bullet Bill, as it was large, red, and snarling. Koopa Jr fired a Bullet Bill at it, but yours knocked them away. When it hit Koopa Jr's ship, it exploded rather violently, creating a large hole.

===

"What the... Bullet Bills don't explore that big!" Kooky exclaimed. "I must find out how the interloper did that and keep the secret for myself!"

Then Kooky's ship shook when it was hit by one of your Bullet Bills. Kooky muttered, "Oohh Just wait until I get my hands on him and find out what he did to our father!"

Looking at his troops, Kooky ordered, "Para-Beetles! ParaTroopas! Invade the castle!"

Just as the troops saluted, several explosions came from Koopa Jr's ship. When Kooky looked over he gasped when he saw the ship had been hit with enough Bullet Bills to cause structural damage. The mini-King Koopa cried out, "Save me!"

Kooky looked at his troops and ordered, "You heard the brat! Save him or King Koopa will have our shells!"

"What of the ships crew?" A flying Goomba asked.

"What about them?" Kooky spat.

As Koopa Jr was saved, his troops were scared they were going down with the ship.

===

You grabbed a megaphone and ordered, "Any Paratroopa who goes out to save the crew on Koopa Jr's ship will get getting a speed boost spell and a strength boost. Save as many as you can!"

As a number of ParaTroopas flew out, you cast the spells, allowing them to fly like speeding bullets.

===

"Me thinks we should retreat! all the other Doom Ships are under heavy assault" A goomba said.

"We're the leaders, not you!" Koopa Jr. exclaimed as he kicked the Goomba away. "We attack and we win!"
1532312211221.title: Let them approach the castle, use your defenses

choices: They unanimously agree to join you
It's a mixed bag
They decline your offer
15323122112211.content:
You sit on your throne with both of your opponents sitting in front of you and their wands at your feet. The battle ended after your now enhanced ParaTroopas swarmed Kooky's ship, took their wands and their men, and left them stranded. With no army or magic, the two soon surrendered. Now you simply await the other three.

No sooner do you think that do you hear footsteps approaching. "I can't believe I lost to her twice." You hear muttered.

"Well Bully, maybe if you and your men didn't let yourselves fall under her spell and backed up me and my troops, we might've won." A shrill voice replies. The southern door to the throne room opens, and you see Morrigan walk in, pulling Bully and Kootie Pie behind her by leashes.

"Here you go boss. Two koopa gifts for you." Morrigan says with a bow. "No casualties from eitherside during the battle, either.

"Good, set them by the others." She does so as they both take their seats in line while Morrigan places their wands on the pile with the two you have.

"Kooky? Jr.? They got you too?" Bully asks.

"Afraid so. This interloper not only got father's army to follow him with so much loyalty, he also improved Bullet Bills beyond what I've ever seen." Kooky answers while Jr. just sighs.

Before any other small talk could happen, another door opens to Samus in her power suit holding both Koopa twins by the scruff of their necks in one hand. She walks in and unceremoniously drops the two in line before putting her wands in the ever-growing pile at your feet. "Any casualties?" You ask.

"Nope. My reputation proceeded me. The small fry turned tail and surrendered at the sight of my ship and these two were hardly a challenge after that." She admits.

"Good to hear. Now all that's left is..." Speak of the devil, Syrup comes in threw the last door with Big Mouth tied up and Cheatsy... free?! "Syrup, what's the meaning of this?"

"Not long after the battle started, Cheatsy here turned his guns on Big Mouth. With two on one against him, he stood no chance and quickly surrendered along with Cheatsy." She explains as she puts Big Mouth in line and sets down the last two wands.

"I see. Unfortunately, Cheatsy needs to join his siblings for now." You order. To your surprise, he sat down next to the others with no fuss. "Ahem, well then." You say, getting their attention.

"I am Alex, the new king of the Koopa Kingdom." You start before you were interrupted.

"Not once papa gets free from wherever you have him." Jr. shouts out. Not losing your cool, you respond to him.

"King Koopa is dead by his own arrogance and incompetence. I personally dealt the killing blow to him after he had me kidnapped and framed." You tell them. You are surprised at the mixed reactions you got from them at your words. Jr., Kooky and the twins seemed saddened by this, while Kootie Pie, Bully, Cheatsy and Big Mouth ranged from uncaring to... happy?

"Do not weep for him. He was an incompetent leader, and from my understanding, a poor father to you lot. I have no wish for all of you to share his fate, quite the opposite, in fact. I want the eight of you to join me, not just as members of my army, but as my own children." You announce.

Everyone, your generals included, look at you in silent shock that you would even offer that, especially after you just admitted to killing their father. "I know it sounds strange, but I see potential in all of you. Potential squandered by Koopa and his schemes. I would see you all treated well with many rewards for success as opposed to insults after failure like Koopa. I swear to be a father he could only dream to be." You rant. "Well? What do you all say?"
15323122112211.title: Victory

choices: Spread propaganda that ruins the Mushroom Kingdom
Talk to your new kids about what you have planned for them
Ask your kids if they were happy with their lives so far
something else happens
153231221122111.content:
The Koopalings huddled together and muttered to each other.

Various guards around the room started their way over to the group to separate them, but you held up a hand to stop them.

Samus and Morrigan looked like they were bored, but close inspection of their slight movements was a hint they were ready to fight.

Captain Syrup looked about and saw that no one was paying attention to her, so she 'picked' up a gold ring from a bag near your throne. She was unaware you were wary of thieves in your group, so the ring would slowly make anyone who wore it loyal to you.

Eventually, the Koopalings stood in a line. Bully spoke, "yeah, so most of us decided we'll throw our lot in with youse, Alex. But youse look like you're only a few years older than me. so youse gotta prove youse can fight on yer own to get my loyalty, yah dig?"

"How so?" You asked.

"Fight me," Bully said with a smirk. "But if I win, I gets to be the boss."

You knew you were leaner and looked weaker than Bully and most of the Koopalings, so one might think you would lose.

The Triforce of Power within you would make the fight quite easy.

You stood up and cracked your knuckles, saying, "Alright."

Cheatsy briefly looked concerned for Bully and asked, "Bully? Are you certain you want to fight him?"

"Oh yeah! I gots to prove that it'll be my gang, not his, you squinty little turtle!" Bully replied, cracking his neck.

Cheatsy frowned and said "You know what? Fight him. Go all out!"

Bully chuckled as you and him were in the middle of the room, while the others watched from afar.

Bully pulled a hand back and threw a punch towards you.

You caught his fist, scaring him. His fear grew more when you smiled and chuckled.

"What's so-" Bully uttered before you lifted him up and threw him into a wall. "Oooww..."

"I win," you replied. "Anyone else?"

The rest of the Koopalings all uttered various words for refusals about challenging you.

"I like to think I'm a kind ruler," You said as you cast a healing spell on Bully.

A wary Bully got up, joined the other Koopalings, and said, "I guess this you're our dad.... Dad."

"So... What did King Koopa had you all do before he was killed?" You asked.

"Antagonize the Mushroom Kingdom!" Hip and Hop said.

"Test my inventions on them!" Kooky added.

"Take whatever I want from them!" Kootie Pie added with a chuckle.

"Show them dat we're the strongest!" Bully crowed.

"Scam them out of everything they own," Cheatsy hissed with a grin.

"Show that we're the best!" Koopa Jr cackled.

"Take over the lands, add to the Koopa Kingdom, expand the Koopa empire, obliterate all oppugnant opposition, crush the challengers, Destroy all dissidents, eliminate-" Big Mouth said before Bully headslapped the talker to shut him up.

After a few moments, you decided your next plan was to...
153231221122111.title: You get the Koopalings

choices: You dismiss your children to set about their tasks
They need new names first
You prepare to take a smaller game kingdom
1532312211221112.content:
"Listen kids, I have every intention of taking over the mushroom kingdom, but there's gonna have to be some changes from when Koopa was in charge. For starters, you lot are no longer the heads of my armies. Now you've take orders from my generals as well as myself." You tell them, motioning to your three leaders.

There is a wave of objections coming from the Koopalings, but with a raise of your hand, they are all silenced. "I know it may seem unfair, but Koopa had left you too untrained in terms of tactics and combat. As such, my hope is that you will learn from the three of them, then one day you might find yourselves back in command. Until further notice though, you take orders from them when I assign you to work together. Am I understood?" You rant.

The eight of them silently bow while your generals show acknowledgement. "Good. Now, for your reassignments. Cheatsy, I'm putting you under Syrup's direct command on the doomship fleet. I figure you two can work well together, and she seems to have no problem working with you." You order.

"Of course King dad." He says before getting up and walking over to his new captain.

"Just 'dad' will do, that goes for all of you. Next, Kooky. You are going to remain here at the castle as head of R&D. You will develop new weapons using any new tech we acquire combined with our own and will only deploy when I tell you. Can I trust you to handle that?" You ask.

"Yes dad. I won't disappoint." He replies.

"I would hope not. Kootie Pie, you're next. I want you to build a castle along the border to the mushroom kingdom. You'll be using it to keep an eye on them, and as a bonus, you get to keep the castle as your own." You tell her.

You can see a glimmer in her eyes. "My... my own castle?! All King Koopa ever gave me was my doomship and the occasional fort to stop the Mario Brothers, which never lasted long. Th-thank you daddy." She says before running up to hug you.

"You're welcome my little princess." You tell her as you pat her on the head and motion for her to get back in line with her brothers. "Big Mouth, your turn. I'm having you go to Ganon's old territory and take charge in my stead. You'll also be in charge of keeping an eye on Hyrule and it's business and report it to me." You tell him.

"Of course father. I shall not fail you. Hyrule will not even sneeze without you knowing it. They shall live in fear of me being over their shoulder. They will..." Bully goes to smack him again, but a glare from you both stops him as well as silences Big Mouth.

"I understand, and Bully, since you were so polite as to raise your hand, I suppose I'll assign you next. You are going to be training the new recruits so they are battle ready. Understood?" You ask.

The Koopa in question quickly lowers his hand in panic. "Y-yes dad. I can handle that." He says.

"Good. Toughen them up, but don't abuse them." You order before addressing all of them. "And that goes for all of you. The troops and citizens of my kingdom are not to be mistreated. Am I clear?" You ask, getting nods from everyone, your generals included.

"Excellent. Hip, Hop, you two are up. Since you're both young, I feel wrong putting you in combat, but I have confidence in you both. That's why I want you to fight alongside Morrigan and her forces. She can better teach you about magic and the world in general." You tell them.

Both twins agree and they go to stand next to the succubus like Cheatsy with Syrup. "And what about me papa?" Jr. asks.

"You, I wish to personally teach about leadership. So, you will be stationed here like Kooky, only your task will to be my student." You tell him. "I hope you can learn from me and grow into a strong ruler."

What happens next?
1532312211221112.title: There's gonna be some changes around here.

choices: Salad Kingdom gets conquered
you get gifts from Cornelia.
You ask if anyone has any suggestions
something else happens
15323122112211123.content:
"So... What's our next matter of business?" Morrigan asked.

"Ever hear of the Salad Kingdom?" You asked, getting looks of confusion from almost everyone in the room. You had played Princess Tomato in the Salad Kingdom a few times when you were younger and were fond of it.

Captain Syrup was the first to speak up, "It's a kingdom where most of the inhabitants are vegetable people, though one of the princesses is a human and a group of thugs called farmies are also human. You plan on taking that over?"

You nodded. "In a month or so, after everyone gets used to the changes I've done. As for Salad Kingdom, most of the combat is between the people there is done via Rock-paper-scissors and they all are honorable to obey the winner's single demand. So I'll send in Captain Syrup, Cheatsy, their crew, and a few squads, but I'll make sure to grant you all magic items that will let you read their minds, just to insure you win easily."

"So... any thoughts at who you'll put in charge of that?" Cheatsy asked with a grin.

"Yeah, I'm kinda interested too, dad, since it'll be my students that'll be in those squads," Bully asked, trying to look tough by crossing his arms. He also looked quiet interested in the answer

"I haven't, but it depends on how well it is conquered and how willing the people obey and like us. I don't want to wind up like Minister Pumpkin and get overthrown by a Cucumber Knight in a matter of days," You said. "I know they had giant robots, but I'm pretty sure they've been destroyed. Therefore the remains of those Giant robots should be of importance and brought to Kooky."

"Really, dad? Thank you!" Kooky replied with a bow. "I'll be sure to make the grandest giant robot ever!"

"I'll be happy with one that's best described as 'boring but practical', Kooky. No need to get extravagant," You replied

"Are we going to hav'a deal with Eggplant Wizard?" Hip asked. Hop then asked, "Cause he's friends with King Hippo and he looks tough!"

"No, I doubt he will. He's too busy serving Mother Brain, fighting Captain N and Princess Lana," Samus answered. "But just in case... I suggest letting me tag along in my ship in stealth mode. I can handle anything Mother Brain throws at them."

"Yes, that does sound like a good idea, Samus. We'll do that," You replied.

"And what about us?" Morrigan asked, gesturing to Hip Hop, and a few magikoopas.

"Scout Cornelia in the Final Fantasy worlds. See what items, spells, and anything else you can find and bring here," You replied. "Recruit who is willing. Avoid fighting heroes, though."

Morrigan nodded.
15323122112211123.title: You prepare to take a smaller game kingdom

choices: You keep her as a hostage of sorts...
You get a Goddess General
You ask that she leave, as you are getting unsettled by her actions
something else happens
1532312213.content:
"Palutena," Mouser answered as he lead you to the dungeon.

"Palutena? As in the Goddess of Light and rightful ruler of Angel Land?" You asked with fear in your voice.

Mouser looked back and asked, "Is she really that dangerous?"

"If she decided to, she can send an endless army of angels to kill us all," You answered. When Mouser gulped in fear, you said, "But as long as we're diplomatic and polite, we'll live."

Y-yeah... Good thing you're the leader..." Mouser replied nervously. "King Koopa would have thrown his weight around."

"And it's be a tossup of if he fell to the underworld by Palutena's will or because he crashed his way there," You replied with a grin, getting a chuckle from Mouser. "And before you ask, you may keep your distance."

Mouser sighed with relief, "Thanks."

===

You were surprised to see that Palutena was pretty chill for being in a dungeon.

"Oh! Hello! Are you the interrogator or the leader?" Palutena asked.

"I am Alex and I am the leader. Why did you attack Morrigan?" You asked.

"Well, it was the only way I could get here with her," Palutena answered.

"That... doesn't make sense," You muttered. "You could have simply asked.

"I did, but you know how the forces of light and darkness act towards each other, right?" Palutena replied cheerfully.

"Violently?" You asked.

"Right! It's mostly the followers that attack on-sight, but the leaders do sometimes let their emotions control them," Palutena sighed. Quickly cheering up, she asked, "Can I be let out if I promise not to attack?"

"...Okay, and if you're near me, I'll prevent Morrigan from attacking you, as she is one of my generals," you said as you unlocked the cell door.

"Oh? She's a general of yours? Do you have any other generals?" Palutena innocently asked.

"Samus Aran..." You replied, wondering if she either was crazy, trying something, or really was as innocent as she seemed to appear.

"Ah, she's normally all business, but working with Kevin Keen and Princess Lana did make her open up to the idea of working with others. Maybe you'll be the lucky guy who marries her?" Palutena commented, wining at the last statement.

"Why did you want to come here?" You asked as you led her out of the dungeon.

Once out, you just led her around. Statues of King Koopa were taken down and replaced by either statues of you or of some notable minions, flowers to spruce things up, or benches.

"Well, I didn't like how the other rulers of Video Game Land distrust you, simply because of a few pictures that I'm pretty sure are fake. So I told them that I'd prevent you from being too bad, as you are still a human and thus will get my protection," Palutena answered. "So I can be a hostage to prevent the others from attacking you, as I let the other rulers I would be trying this... Or..."

"Or what?" You asked.

"I can become one of your generals! Since you're not a mean and evil person, it sounds like fun! It's been so long since I did anything other than be a goddess or a ruler. Sure there's potion brewing or researching, but those are hobbies!" Palutena answered.
1532312213.title: Palutena

choices: You run into Morrigan
Samus comes looking for you
One of your goombas was attacked by Toadstool
15323122132.content:
"I think I'll take you up on that offer of joining my army. A goddess of light and her army would make fine additions to my forces. But I only find it fair to warn you of something real quick." You tell her.

"Oh? And what might that be?" She asks.

"I have a great ambition. One that will inevitably have me clash with Lana and her kingdoms of Light. I will still do battle woth the forces of evil, but I will have to fight both eventually to achieve my goal." You explain.

"I see, well then, what is this grand vision of yours?" Palutena questions.

"Tell me, did you know that there is a goomba within my army that is actually pen pals with a toad from mushroom kingdom?" You ask, earning a head shake from Palutena. "Neither did Koopa, nor does Toadstool. The two have become friends even after knowing who the other is. However, due to laws in place by Toadstool, should my goomba try to enter the mushroom kingdom to see his friend, he will be attacked on sight and it will be seen as an act of war."

"Oh my!" She exclaims.

"Indeed. I wish to create a new kingdom out of a united Video Game Land. One where those once seen as light and dark can coexist. One where goomba and toad, moblin and hylian can live together in peace. However, there will be those from both sides who will cling to the old ways and oppose this plan." You rant.

"A noble goal indeed. However, I sense another reason within you." She says.

"Alright, I'll admit. I wouldn't mind ruling a kingdom and having a few pretty ladies on my arms because of it, but it's not like I'm out to be a creep about it." You admit with a bit of blush.

"There, now you are being honest with me. Very well. Myself and my army are at your complete disposal." She says.

"Truly!? That's good to hear. Welcome aboard." You say with an outstretched hand, which she eagerly takes.

What happens next?
15323122132.title: Adding a Goddess to the Ranks

choices: Toadstool and Zelda are to become servants of yours
Toadstool and Zelda are to become your sex slaves
Toadstool and Zelda are to become your wives
you think Palutena's testing you. Back to capturing the Koopalings
153231221321.content:
You and Palutena paused when you heard a hateful hiss, "What... is... SHE... doing out of her cell?"

Looking behind the two of you, was Morrigan.

With as an authorative voice as you could muster, you said, "You are not to attack her unless she or her forces attack first, Morrigan."

Pointing at Palutena, Morrigan growled, "She is a goddess! A goddess of light! She will be detrimental to your cause!"

"She gave her word she won't attack and she offered to become one of my generals," You replied.

"Please tell me that you refused her..." Morrigan pleaded, giving a brief glare to the goddess.

"She offered and I let her. It's a good way for me to make sure I'm making good decisions. A sexy demon on one shoulder and an attractive goddess on the other, both offering advice. I believe I have made a good decision," You said.

Palutena hugged one of your arms and cooed, "And I agree!"

Morrigan quickly hugged your other arm and glared at Palutena.

You resisted the urge to sigh, thinking, 'Why couldn't you be more like your video game self, Cartoon-Morrigan? She'd be amused by the idea of working with a goddess and probably plan on either having sex with her or corrupting her...'

"So what is your next plan?" Palutena asked, finding Morrigan's action amusing.

"Is there a meeting between the rulers of Video game land?" You asked.

"Yes, in about two weeks," Palutena answered.

"Two question. Can you sneak Morrigan into that meeting, Palutena?" You asked the goddess as you looked at her. Then you looked at Morrigan and asked, "Morrigan, can you hypnotize women or put in a command to be hypnotized if they hear a codeword from me?"

Morrigan looked at you and cheerful said, "Yes, I can make women into servants with my hypnotic eyes and can easily do the second."

You looked at Palutena and she answered, "Yes, I can. Either I can disguise her in servant's garb or... She can go in my form and wear my clothes! My garb can hide her demonic energy from any detectors and I can make a tiny version of myself to give her advice on how to pretend to be like me!"

"Go as your servant? Go as YOU!? You are a mad goddess!" Morrigan growled as she lept away from you, readying herself for a fight.

You did note that both beauties did kind of look alike, especially with their green hair.

"Morrigan, calm down," You said. It took a moment, but Morrigan did so. You looked towards Palutena and asked, "Any complaints about Morrigan hypnotizing Toadstool or Zelda into my servants?"

"Servants? As in just servants or sex slaves?" Palutena asked, tilting her head a little and had a wondering tone to her voice. "And why not hypnotized brides?"

"Well, if they're hypnotized servants and sign their kingdoms over to me, they'll still have their virginity and such. I may be evil, but I still have standards," You answered. "As for marriage, I don't want any kids to be in a loveless and hateful relationship, even if I think the would-be mothers deserve to be in one."

Then Palutena said something that really surprised Morrigan and you, to the point that both your jaws dropped. "Really? Princess Zelda has one delightful derriere, while I'd like to see Toadstool give you a blowjob with those lovely lips of hers!"

After shaking your head a little to get back in the game, you replied, "Hypnotizing wears off, Palutena."

"Not unless Morrigan and I both work together to re-write their minds! That would make it permanent!" Palutena cheerful answered.

'And I thought Morrigan might be the darkest and evilest Ally I would have. Palutena's either testing me or there's something I don't know,' You thought as you stared at her.

Morrigan spoke up first, "Why suggest such a treatment for your previous allies? Is this a test?"

Letting you go and raising her hands in placating manner, Palutena said, "Oh, it's because I believe in Alex's vision. Besides, Toadstool needs to realize that not all who worked for King Koopa are evil and Zelda's been a horrible tsundere towards more than just Link nowadays. Despite my power, both have been trying to push me out of our alliance, or at least try to reduce how much say I have. So... I want to both get revenge and help our leader, Alex!"

You made a decision.
153231221321.title: You run into Morrigan

choices: Have her be a servant.
Have her disguise as Palutena and use the two weeks to learn how to act like her
Something else
1532312213211.content:
"No, they are to be servants and no further. I'm not going to rob them of their virginities or the right to a loving marriage. Of course, I certainly won't mind getting an eyeful every now and then, maybe a handful." You tell the two of them.

"My, so noble and yet so naughty at the same time boss." Morrigan coos.

"Indeed. It's part of what inspired me to join him. He is a nice man, yet doesn't try to deny his darker urges." Palutena chimes in. "So have you decided how you wish to get Morrigan into the summit?"

"Not yet. First, I wish to inform Samus in this plan." You tell them.

"I see. Well, before we do so, I believe introductions are in order." Palutena says before raising her staff, creating a divine light from the... ceiling?

Descending from the light was Pit, only not the one from Captain N, he looked more like the one from those anime shorts you saw on your 3DS. You choose not to argue this given your memory of Captain N Pit being the equivalent of taking a cheese grater to your ears.

"You summoned me Lady Palutena?" He asks before seeing where he was as well as you and Morrigan standing across from him. "Look out!" He pulls back an arrow of light and aims it at you.

"Oh no you don't!" Morrigan yells before preparing to dive at him. Both you and Palutena stop your respective subordinates by putting your arm and her staff in front of them.

"Pit, meet Alex, our new king." She tells him, making him lower his weapon in confusion.

"King? But Lady Palutena, he is with the forces of darkness, he stole holy arrows from Skyworld, he even has a demon concubine. Why would you serve him? When does a goddess even serve a king?" He asks in a hyperactive manner. You and Morrigan both blush a tad at her being so bluntly referred to as a concubine.

"He was forced to join the forces of darkness and is making the best of it. The arrows he took went to the slaying of Ganon, a feat Zelda and Link could only hope to achieve. That 'concubine' is Morrigan, one of his generals. A goddess can serve if she so chooses, however unusual it may sound, and I choose to serve Alex out of faith in his ideals." She answers him in a nonchalant tone, as if she was expecting these questions.

"What ideals could he have that could drive a goddess of light to serve a king of darkness?" He asks.

"I'll explain it later. For now, know that I answer to him, so you do by extension." She orders.

"Very well." He says before walking up to you, much to Morrigan's displeasure as she clutches your arm tighter. "Hello, I am Pit, servant of the goddess of light and her captain of the guard." He says with a kneel.

You chuckle a bit. "I am Alex, new ruler of the Koopa Kingdom and soon all of Video Game Land. Rise Pit, there's no need to be so formal with me." You tell him as he stands up.

"I summoned Pit here as a sign of faith. Until my centurions arrive in force, he will be my representative in your armies. Is that okay?" Palutena asks.

"It's fine, Samus can use the help while we are dealing with capturing the princesses." You tell her. Pit gives her a concerned look at the mention of kidnapping, but a warm look from Palutena puts him at ease. "Now come on, we need to find Samus and tell her the plan." You lead them out of the room and out to Samus' ship.

"Hey boss. What's with the ensemble?" She asks as she sees you approach.

"These are Morrigan and Palutena, your fellow generals, and this is Pit, your second-in-command while we are away." You say as you motion to each of them.

"Away? Where are you going?" She asks.

"Morrigan, Palutena and I are going to get Toadstool and Zelda to join us. We'll be gone for about two weeks preparing. While we are away, you and Pit are in command of my armies. You will defend my castle as well as take over Morrigan's task of capturing the Koopalings. Am I understood?" You ask both of them.

"Got it boss." She answers.
"Yes sir." Pit adds in.

"Good." You turn back to the other two. "Now then, about getting Morrigan into the meeting..."
1532312213211.title: Toadstool and Zelda are to become servants of y...

choices: At the meeting, Morrigan's disguise is flawless
Palutena somehow captures the Koopalings and makes them want her as their mom
Pit tries to send word to the princesses about your plan
something else happens
15323122132112.content:
"I think it would be best if Morrigan dresses up as Palutena. If Zelda and Toadstool are trying to squeeze our goddess out of their alliance, then they'd be more willing to look her in the eyes as a challenge. Thus, they'd fall under Morrigan's hypnotic eyes and then later Palutena will finish the job later," You said.

Morrigan smiled for a moment before realizing she'd be wearing the garb of a goddess and shuttered. "Do you realize what you're asking of me? Her remnant power in her clothes might corrupt me! It's holy energy from Heaven!"

Palutena chuckled before she said, "Goddess or demon, we get our power from the same source. It's affected by our actions and desires. It won't effect you, just hide your aura."

Morrigan glared and was about to say something, but you asked with a stern tone, "Morrigan, can you mimic Palutena?"

Morrigan took a deep breath and shimmered for a moment. All of a sudden, she looked like Palutena, save for being in Morrigan's clothes. Then she spoke in Palutena's voice, "Does this answer your question, Boss?"

Palutena clasped her hands and happily said, "Ah! Such skill! I could have used you to avoid those boring meetings about 'what land could be used as a go-kart race track' or 'what place could be used to host a fair'... Though that last one can lead to some fun... "

"You are quite talented, Morrigan, Will wearing Palutena's clothes effect your eyes?" You asked.

"I'm not sure, but let's check," Morrigan cooed before she began to disrobe, still looking like Palutena.

"Ah! Not in front of them while you look like me!" Palutena cried before grabbing Morrigan and dragging her to a nearby room.

You uttered, "Huh..."

Looking over at Pit, you saw that he still looked quite uncomfortable with everything.

After a few minutes, The two walked out. If it wasn't for the expression of their eyes and body language, you would have sworn they just waited in the room.

Looking at the one in Goddess Robes who sported a glare and had her shoulder's slumping, you said, "You need to work on those eyes, Morrigan."

The one in Morrigan's clothes said, "And you do need to learn the poise of a goddess."

Morrigan sent a glare ar Palutena for a moment before she adjusted her posture and spoke, "I am a succubus, I can use anyone's appearance with a glance and can mimic their posture with a glance. I just need political details as I cannot read minds."

Pit gritted his teeth, as he once dealt with both a fake Palutena and a mind-controlled one.

You nodded before you said, "I'm quite interested in those political details as well, since I will be ruling Video Game Land."

"I'd be happy to tell you and let you look over the decrees I've been sent, Boss,"Palutena said. She then looked at Pit and had a naughty urge come over her. She spun around a little, wiggled her butt at Pit, and asked, "How do I look, Pit?"

"You... You... You... Gah, this is too weird!" Pit uttered, covering his eyes, blushing, and looking away.

"Heh, still got it," Palutena chuckled.
15323122132112.title: Disguises

choices: Enter the castle and get to work
See how the talks went
Check on Samus and Pit back home
153231221321121.content:
The two of you spend the next two weeks learning everything there is to know about these three and their alliance. Some of the things they demanded from her were insane. Toadstool actually demanded Palutena to allow her Toad engineers to construct a race track in her temple, going right through her own bedroom, and if Palutena declined then it would be a breach of the alliance.

Zelda was worse. She wanted Palutena to request the goddess of nature Viridi, whom Palutena is at war with, to let down a massive rainstorm on Hyrule, not to water crops or fill a reservoir, but to fill up the royal wayer park. And again, if Palutena said no, then it was a breach of the alliance. It's like they weren't even hiding the fact that they were forcing her out.

These issues, among others, were to be discussed at this summit. Palutena then told you of some of her requests in the past. Once, while she was at war with Hades, she requested the pair of them to use their influence to tell the people that they were being tricked about a fake wish. They refused, saying that they had more important issues to deal with. And you were supposed to be the bad guy here?

*****

After two weeks of practice, Morrigan had everything down pat. The look, the mannerisms, right down to the way she looked you in the eye, a look Zelda and Toadstool will soon be acquainted with. You recieved no word from Samus on the Koopaling hunt, but you're sure she's fine. You just need to focus on this meeting.

"You ready for this?" You ask Morrigan in her Palutena disguise.

"Yes boss. I can pass as a better Palutena than Palutena." She boasts, making the goddess of light roll her eyes.

"Riight. Just remember the plan. You get in there and start talking. Make things heated enough to get them to stare you in the eye so you can use your powers. With them under your control, contact me via telepathy and we'll approach the castle under the guise of surrender terms from the Koopa Kingdom. You use Toadstool to allow us entrance, then we come up, and you and I use our powers to rewrite them into the boss' servants. After that, they'll officially sign their respective kingdoms over to us. Then we'll be that much closer to peace." Palutena rants, currently dressed like Morrigan.

"Right right. Don't worry, I won't let the boss down." Morrigan says with a wink to you before heading towards Toadstool's castle.

"Do you really think she can handle this?" Palutena asks once she's out of earshot.

"I have confidence in her." You tell her.

*****

Finally, Palutena gets a telepathic message from Morrigan. "It's time."
153231221321121.title: At the meeting, Morrigan's disguise is flaw...

choices: You head back to your castle, pleased at your victory
You ask your generals if they did anything to the princesses
something else happens
something else happens
1532312213211211.content:
When you neared the castle, Palutena made sure to put on a cloak to hide her identity even more. you wondered why, as she was in Morrigan's clothes, no one would be looking her in the face.

A number of mushroom guards and a Hylian guards aimed spears at you. One mushroom guard asked, "Halt! Who goes there!?"

"The current ruler of the Koopa Kingdom. I wish to discuss the terms of surrender with Princess Toadstool, Princess Zelda, and Princess Lana," You said with a kind smile.

"Princess Lana is not here at the moment, but those other two are," A Hylian guard replied. "Where's King Koopa?"

"He had an unexpected fatal Lava trip and I was thrust into command," you answered.

"I'll go ask if they want to meet you. Stay there," A mushroom guard loudly said before walking inside the castle.

Within a few minutes, 'Palutena' Princess Zelda, and Princess Toadstool walked out. The princesses were behind 'Palutena', using her as a shield if something happened. Zelda looked somewhere between her cartoon incarnation and her Ocarina of time version, While Toadstool looked like a more attractive version of her cartoon version.

"So, you're here to discuss some terms of surrender with us?" Zelda asked.

"Yes, me and my general wish to talk about them. Shall we talk here or inside?" You asked, tilting your head a little to look a bit more silly.

"Inside would be alright," Toadstool said, knowing there were plenty of guards that would come running if she cried out.

Palutena spoke in an husky voice"I do have to ask, will there be any food?"

Both Zelda and Toadstool glared at the disguised Goddess, who did her half of the brainwashing.

Your innocently-seeming smile gained a slightly evil edge as you watched the two princesses's expression go from egotistically angry to subserviently calm.

"There is fresh fruit," Toadstool said in a voice that was getting less angry as she spoke. "Follow us."

As you and Palutena followed the Trio, the goddess thought, 'I hope Alex doesn't mind me and Morrigan having a bit of fun with Zelda and Toadstool. I certainly deserve some time with them on MY terms...'

===

Once at the meeting room, you saw it was elegantly decorated, celebrating heroes from the Mushroom Kingdom, Hyrule, a number of animal mascots, and even ones from Angel Land. You guessed the castle and the room was designed before Zelda and Toadstool were getting uppity.

"So I was wondering if the terms on this were fair for Hyrule, the Mushroom Kingdom, Angel Land, and the Koopa Kingdom?" You asked as you handed a rather wordy contract.

Even though you were held down by metal bars, the fact you were in a clean lab with a bearded scientist was relieving, as you knew it was Dr. Light. He currently was looking away at a table, filled with broken parts. You guessed it was that portal transportation device he talked about.

"Anything I can do, Doc?" Mega Man asked. He also was facing away from you, also facing the table.

"Just let me know if there's any change in our guest, Mega Man," Dr. Light answered. Mega Man nodded his head

A female voice from the other side of the room said, "He's awake, Mega."

You looked and saw the Adult-looking Roll, sitting on a chair and using some sorta sonic-screwdriver thing on the device on her left arm.. She smiled and waved at you with her left hand.

"Oh, good. Then we can talk," Dr. Light muttered as he turned around. Looking you in the eyes, he said, "I am Dr. Light. apologize for the restraints, but we had no idea of what you'd act like once you're awake. Can you speak english?"

"Yes, I can," You answered.

"I'm Mega Man, Dr. Light's chief Assistant." Mega Man said.

"And I'm Roll, martial artist expert bot!" Roll said as she stood up.

"My name is Alex," You replied.

"I know it's annoying to be bound, but better safe than sorry, right?" Mega Man said..

Dr. Light nodded before continuing, "From a scanning device I have, we found out you're from another dimension. I worried that such travel might've caused you to go mad from exposure to whatever might exist between dimensions. I'm glad you're okay. I'll undo the restraints, but be careful, as you might have some injury from traveling between worlds that my scanners didn't detect."

After the metal bars retracted, you carefully sat up and felt your legs. No sore spots or anything.

After carefully standing up, you took some wary steps and said, "I feel fine. No injuries... not any that I can notice at the moment."

"That's good to hear. Now for the bad news," Dr. Light said before stepping to the side and gesturing to the table of broken parts. "This is what remains of my portal transportation device. It exploded after you came out of the portal.For my experiment, I tried to keep it simple by keeping the portals localized to this room, but something happened and one portal opened up in your dimension. I won't be able to get the replacements for the destroyed parts for some time. Even then, I'll have to calibrate all of it to prevent it from exploding again. There's also the fact you technically don't have any records in our world. I contacted some friends I have, though. As long as you're with me, Mega Man, or Roll, you'll be fine if you have any trouble with law enforcement."

"Uhm, thanks, Doctor Light," You answered, feeling a little embarrassment from the fact you'll be having a babysitter, even if two of them are awesome robots.

"So tell us a bit about yourself and we'll tell you about ourselves," Dr. Light said, sitting on a chair.

'This might get awkward. Maybe if I lead in with the 'What is real here is fiction elsewhere. What's fiction here is real elsewhere' line, letting them know there's a video game series about Mega Man might be okay,' You thought as you and Mega Man sat down. Roll pulled her chair up to the little group.

1551231.content:
You took a deep breath and sighed.

"Is something wrong? Do you need a moment?" Dr. Light asked with concern.

"If you need some time by yourself to calm down, we'll understand," Mega Man added.

'They really are father and son,' you thought. You said, "No, I'm just preparing myself for telling you something that most would think is.. insane."

"It can't be that bad," Roll said.

You smirked and said, "Before I say more,, is anyone familiar with the saying 'What is real here is fiction elsewhere. What's fiction here is real elsewhere'?"

Mega Man and Roll looked confused, but Dr. Light looked a bit more serious. After a few moments, he asked, "So... You're saying we're works of fiction in your world?"

"No. Just that there's a few works of fiction oddly similar to this world. You're all real. There's also a number of different series with a number of changes. They're mostly video games," you answered.

"So... are they good?" Roll asked.

"The main series has been going on strong for 30 some years, even if there's a few years where it was in hibernation. There's also been a number of spinoffs, like one where Dr. Light decided to work on the internet instead of robotics," You said.

Dr. Light look genuinely curious about what you said and asked, "What about Dr. Wily? Does he work on the Internet as well or is he still working on robotics?"

"Robotics, though as time passed, he learned how to create programs on the internet. Speaking of those, in those games, You have a son and grandsons, though one had a sickness that nearly killed them at birth, so he was transferred into a computer world, where he grew up to that game's version of Mega Man," You answered.

"And the me in that world?" Roll asked with some hesitant in her voice.

"You exist as a computer program and don't worry, it's one of those computer programs that are nearly sentient. Protoman also exists, but bounces somewhere between neutral and an ally to Mega Man," You answered.

"At least there's a world where Protoman is a good guy. Mine Dr. Wily's right hand man," Mega Man muttered.

"I hate to say this, but in the main video games, Protoman was created by Dr. Light, and is ally to Mega Man and is one who is as sentient and emotional as any human, but it's because a problem with his energy core. It provides him with much more energy and the the other stuff I mentioned, but it also had critical problem that would eventually make him stop functioning... until Dr. Wily repaired it in a way that let Protoman keep his independence," You ansswed.

"Why Wily? Why not me? I mean the other me," Dr. Light asked.

"Because that Protoman was worried that you repairing him would take away his freedom to choose. He only went to Dr. Wily because he was desperate and having problems staying functional," You answered.

"So how awesome am I?" Roll asked.

"... You're pretty much the awesome version of yourself. In the main video game canon, all the robots look like they're like 11 or so and are pretty innocent-minded and are pretty robotic in their thinking, save for Protoman and Duo. The video game Roll tends to be something of an assistant to Dr. Light and a cheerleader for Mega Man," You answered. Roll looked pretty disappointed.

"Who is Duo? A robot I built?" Dr. Light asked.

"A robot from Outer space who is fighting something that can be best described as 'evil energy'," You answered.

"So what else can you tell us?" Mega Man asked.

"Ever think of making a new transformation for Rush? Maybe he can change into powered armor? Maybe a flying armor or an armor that heavily increases punching power? Perhaps a suit that can do both?" You suggested. "And make it so that Rush can become armor for both Mega Man and Roll."

Dr. Light rubbed his chin as he pondered your words. "It does sound like useful. Making it for Mega Man would be easier, but allowing Roll to fight on an equal level with Wily's robot Masters is a good idea. Roll, care to help me make the changes to Rush?"

Roll cheered up and saluted as she said, "I'm glad to help, Doc!"

"Me too," Mega Man said.

You said, "Ah, a family project. I'm glad to have started the ball rolling. It's always heartwarming to see a family get along."

Dr. Light, Mega Man, and Roll all smiled at you before Dr. Light said, "You can still help us. Do you have any skill with programming, soldering, or welding?"

"A little bit, but I'm probably better off being a go-fer for you all." You said.

Dr. Light nodded.

As the Light Family worked on giving Rush a new form, you and Eddie worked together.

Eddie brought energy cans for Mega Man, Roll, and Rush, while you brought tea, lunch, and dinner for Dr. Light.

A few hours after dinner, Dr. Light said to his robots, "I think we can stop for now. It's getting rather late and I know the both of you need to recharge."

"yeah, yeah yeah yeah!" Rush said, or at least his head, as he was in pieces as he was being worked on.

Dr. Light looked towards you and said, "We do have a guest room, but it's a bit dusty. Will that be alright, Alex?"

"Yes, it is," You answered.

"Very well, then. Let's get Rush back together. We'll finish him in the morning," Dr. Light ordered.

===

The next day, you were woken up by Eddie. He said, "Wake up, Will! Dr. Light asked that you be awake!"

"I'm up, I'm up," you replied as you rubbed the sand out of your eyes.

Within minutes, you were at the breakfast table, eating pancakes and eggs. So was Dr. Light. Mega Man, Roll, Rush, and Eddie were drinking cans of energy.

"So... How close are you to completing Rush's new form?" You asked.

"Pretty close, just some final touches and doublechecks. I think we can have tests started within two hours," Dr. Light answered.

You looked to Roll and asked, "So... Any good Martial Arts movies playing nearby?"

Roll's eyes lit up. "Sure! There's a Bruce Lee Marathon at the movieplex in the Mall in three hours!"

"I'd love to go, then," You replied.

"Then it's a date!" Roll cheerfully said.

Mega Man couldn't help but tease, "A date-date? You two gonna get a meal afterwords?"

"It's just seeing a few movies, Mega. It's not an actual date..." Rol said with annoyance in her voice. After pondering Mega Man's words and asked you, "Alex, would you have any problems if we did... date?"

"None. You're a cute lady who can stand up and defend herself. Any one would want to date someone like you," You answered.

Roll smiled. If she could blush, she would.

"Hn..." Dr. Light uttered, concentrating on his breakfast.

'Uh oh. protective father mode activated...' You thought.

===

A few hours later, Rush, Mega Man, and Roll were standing at one end of the Lab together. You and Dr. Light were standing at the other end.

Dr. Light said, "Alright. Rush. change into the Super Adapter armor with Mega Man."

"Yup, Yup!" Rush uttered before he began to glow and leap at Mega Man. A moment later, Mega Man's blue armor was red. His lower arms were bigger and there were two flat circular objects on his back.

"How do you feel, Mega Man?" Dr. Light asked.

"Powerful!" Mega Man answered, flexing a little bit. "Let's test out the flight option!"

The circle objects shot out flames and let Mega Man fly around the room for a bit before he landed on the ground.

"Not as maneuverable as the Rush jet, but this is a form for power after all. Now go to the lifting machine and we'll test your strength," Dr. Light answered.

Mega Man went to what looked like a device that had a barbell and lifted it up. Dr. Light slowly spun a dial. After a few minutes, Dr. Light stopped and said, "Well, you're as strong as Gutsman, if not more so, Mega Man."

"And it feels like I can take more!" Mega Man replied.

"I'm going to lower the weight now, so we can let Roll try out the Super Adapter armor," Dr. Light said.

"If you say so, Dr. Light," Mega Man replied as Dr. Light turned the Dial back.

Once the dial was back to the original setting, Mega Man let go of the barbell and took a few steps back. Rush then transformed back to his normal self and leapt away from Mega Man, returning the Blue bomber back to his normal form.

When Rush changed into the Super Adapter Armor on Roll, her armored form looked like the Hyper Roll form from Marvel Vs Capcom.

"Alright, let's try your flight option, Roll," Dr. Light said.

Her jets came from her back, but from some object you couldn't quite see She seemed faster than Mega Man, but her control was looser.

"Now for the weight lifting," Dr. Light said.

"Will do, Doc!" Roll said as she landed. As she held the barbells and Dr. Light turned the dial, Roll said, "A gal could get used to this power..."

"As nice as it is, it is emergency use only, Roll," Dr. Light said.

"Right, Right..." Roll muttered.

===

After the tests, Mega Man and Rush went to the lab to give Rush a few energy biscuits and Roll went to her room to get the money for the tickets, Dr. Light motioned for you to follow him outside.

Once outside, Dr. Light looked towards the forest and said, "I understand you and Roll are going to see a few movies. I also remember that you complemented her on her beauty. I guess I see Mega Man and Roll as something as my children."

A few moments passed of silence.

"I think I know where this is going. I promise that I'll let Roll set the limits and that I won't do anything that will make her feel uncomfortable," You said.

"Good. But keep in mind to let her know if she makes you feel uncomfortable, as she is still new to the world and I don't want her to become something she'll regret later." Dr. Light replied. "Now, I think you and Roll have a few movies to go to."

155211112.content:
As the five continue their way in the tower, they battle a few low level monster. They found some gold and potion, but noting else. As they turned a corner, they saw a double door that was cracked open.

They sneaked up to the door, Dante took a peek. He blushed and smiled.

There was a half dozen lizard man monster, they surrounded a table with food. They where eating and cheering on the entertainment. It was the entertainment that made Dante smiled.

On top of the table was two naked girls, they where on their knees. Their hands tied behind them, as more rope bound them together. Their E cups breasts squeezing against each other.

It took a few moments for Dante to recognized the two girls. They where the twins Ai and Mai from the hentai series Twin Angels. The twins sister where in an intense make out session, he remembered both sister had repress sexual desire for each other.

Which just happens to be one of Dante's favorite.

Dante turned to Pierce and explained his plans. She was to use a spell and kill some of the monster, and he will slay the rest. With a nodded Pierce and Dante ready themselves.

Both of them bust open and Pierce used a basic arcana barrage spell. She took out four out of the six. Dante rushed the last two and quickly defeated them.

The twins looked at and thanks him. Dante quickly untie the girls, both girls hugged him.

The girls told Dante their names and how they where captured and force to entertain the monster in the tower.

What happen next ?

Another floor
15521112.content:
The four where lost, the trail to the tower ended some time ago. So they had to navigate through a dense forest, which was hard. They traveled for hours, then they spotted it.

It was old looking mansion, Dante knew there was noting like this in Dragon Knight. Since both Pink and Pierce where from a different franchise, he knew there might be other stuff too.

The mansion was huge, with three floors. It most likely to have one or two basements too. He could tell it had a large green house/arboretum, pool, garden and other fancy things.

There was a large wall around the mansion. They didn't know what to do, should they go and look into the mansion or go back to the forest and continue to the Goddess Tower.

Then suddenly a power storm started, the four ran to the mansion for shelter.

The mansion design was a gothic victorian, they open the door and enter the mansion.

It was dark and cover in dust, Dante knew it was mostly haunted and they would have to defeat what every thing ghost was to continue.

" Hello, is anyone here !" Shouted Pink, there was no answer.

Then suddenly all the candles lit up. The four marvel at the foyer, it was gorgeous. It was marble and gold with gems everywhere.

" We should spilt up and search the place." Said Luna, Dante just sighed and turned to her.

" This place is mostly haunted, so splitting up is a very bad idea. So we stick together, fine the head ghost and defeat." Said Dante, the girls just nodded.

" Know where do we search first." Said Dante out loud.

Where do the four start searching ?
15521112.title: They get lost and find a haunted Mansion

Raidy
155211121.content:
" We should start are search on the first floor." Said Dante, the three girls nodded. The four started their search, they went room by room. They found the parlour, the dinning room, kitchen and a ball room.

So far they found nothing, Dante knew there will be a ghost of something to fight. He was getting nervous, as they enter the arboretum.

The three girls where excited, the arboretum was filled with kinds of beautiful plants and flowers. The girls started looking at all the flowers.

Dante was sensing danger, so he knew the ghost would be showing up soon. He put his hand on the hilt of his sword, ready himself for battle.

Suddenly Dante heard the girls screamed, he tuned to see the all three girls in the air. They where being held up by many vines, he blushed as the vines where fondling them.

Their moans of pleasure where distracting, but Dante needed to focus.
Then he heard some feminine evil laughter behind him.

He turned and saw to figure, one was a beautiful female like creature. She had green skin, brown hair, blue eyes. She was wearing a light green dress.

The other was hidden by a cloak, but Dante knew the figure was female.

" Welcome, Intruders to my home." Said the green skin woman.

Dante thought she was either an evil nymph or an elemental.

" I'm Fleur, the owner of this place." Said Fleur, with a wicked grinned.

Dante gulped, this cause be a problem. He doubt he was strong enough to face such a creature.

The other figure took off her cloak, Dante smiled at seeing who it was.

It was Raidy from Lightning Warrior Raidy, he didn't care for much of the content in her game but he loved her design.

She had long red hair and eyes, a figure that just kill and large E cup breasts. She was wearing her first game costume.

She drew her sword and charged it up with her lightning magic. Dante knew he had to move, he started running and Raidy started chasing him.

He show a small pond in front of him, he stopped and turned to Raidy. She was charging at him, Dante waited and then moved to the side.

He tripped Raidy, causing her to fall into the pond. He looked at her as she got up. He got ready for a fight, but she looked at him. She looked confused, " Who are you ?" Asked Raidy.

Dante sighed, what ever was control her had stopped.

" Listen, I need your help in defeating Fleur." Said Dante, Raidy nodded.

Then the two found Fleur, and quickly defeated her.

After Fleur's dissolved, a female spirit appeared. She was guarding spirit of the mansion, Fleur had used her dark magic to seal her away.

She said that Dante was the new master of the mansion. The spirit gave him and the four girls each a crystal pendent.

She said this would aloud them to teleport back to the mansion and said Dante could only have four girls with him at a time.

Then the spirit vanished, since it was still raining the four went stairs to pick out rooms.

Dante easily found the master bedroom.

Dante decide to visit the girls in their new rooms.

Which does Dante visit first ?

info.brief_description: You're in the video game-based cartoons, anime, comics, movies, and Etc!
info.description:
Let's get the rules out of the way.

1.) No scat

2.) No permanent death. It's shows based on Video games. Everyone has extra lives.

3.) light vore. Pretty much no swallowing or at lease full-swallowing.

4.) No outright copying entire chapters and passing them off as your own.

5.) Make a name at the start or use Y/N if you can't think of a name.

6. ) No end chapters. Make an epilogue and a sequel option

7.) Any cartoon, anime, comics, or movies are allowed, as long as it was based on a video game first. If you prefer the designs of the video game, then use that design instead.

8.) Crossovers are allowed.


This was formerly known as 'You in the 1980's Super Mario cartoon!' but I realized that was too limiting.

More will be added as time goes on. If you have any questions, let me know.
